MainQuests.name: EMT Worker (Slot)
MainQuests.description:
Well done, Commander! You have unlocked the first EMT Worker slot. Slotting a Survivor in this slot will increase your Homebase Power.

To assign one of your Survivors to your EMT Squad:
Select the Squads tab
Select the Survivor Squads tab
Select EMT Squad
Select the 1st EMT Worker slot
Select a Survivor to slot

objectives.description: Assign a Survivor to the 1st EMT Squad slot

MainQuests.name: Mission Defender (Unlock)
MainQuests.description:
Defenders can also accompany your heroes on missions, provided that you don't already have a full team of Heroes.

To unlock your first Missions Defender:
Select the Skills tab
Select Skill Tree: Tier 1
Select the Mission Defender skill node
Select Purchase to unlock the skill node

objectives.description: Unlock Mission Defender Skill Tree Node

MainQuests.name: Homebase Defender (Unlock)
MainQuests.description:
Commander, we're going to need more help in the next Storm Shield Defense. We can recruit certain survivors to become Defenders.

To unlock your first Storm Shield Defender:
Select the Skills tab
Select Skill Tree: Tier 1
Select the Homebase Defender skill node
Select Purchase to unlock the skill node

objectives.description: Unlock Homebase Defender Skill Tree Node

MainQuests.name: Unlock Squads
MainQuests.description:
Increase your Homebase Power by assigning Survivors to a Survivor Squad.

To unlock the ability to assign a Survivor to one of your Survivor Squads:
Select the Skills tab
Select Skill Tree: Tier 1
Select the Squads skill node
Select Purchase to unlock the skill node

objectives.description: Purchase the Unlock Squads Skill Tree Node

MainQuests.name: Weakpoint Vision
MainQuests.description:
When harvesting, a "Weak Point" will display as a flash of blue light. Swing for the light and reap the rewards!

To unlock Weakpoint Vision:
Select the Skills tab
Select Skill Tree: Tier 1
Select the Weakpoint Vision skill node
Select Purchase to unlock the skill node

objectives.description: Unlock Weakpoint Vision Skill Tree Node

MainQuests.name: Brave New World
MainQuests.description: Launch the Rocket.

objectives.description: Complete a Launch the Rocket mission in a 40+ zone

MainQuests.name: Gravestone
MainQuests.description: Explore the town of Gravestone and prepare for a high noon duel with the deadliest husk in Canny Valley.

objectives.description: Battle Legendary Gunslinger Husk in a 24+ zone, and explore Gravestone.

MainQuests.name: V
MainQuests.description: It's time for Ray to say goodbye to an old Friend. Help Penny build a memorial for Dr. Vinderman.

objectives.description: Build a Memorial in a 22+ zone

MainQuests.name: Please Hold
MainQuests.description: Canny Valley, here we come! Get ready to explore the world beyond Plankerton. Can be only completed in Thunder Route 99.

objectives.description: Discover Landmark in a 22+ zone

MainQuests.name: Just Build
MainQuests.description: With all the sharp-shooting husks in Canny Valley, it's time to brush up on combat building. Build 100 structures in a successful mission.

objectives.description: Build Structures in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: Canny Underground
MainQuests.description: Search the borders of arid zones for underground bunkers. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Search Bunkers in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: The Bones Collector
MainQuests.description: Help Dennis collect bones for his latest experiment. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Collect Bones in a 22+ zone

MainQuests.name: Concept Art
MainQuests.description: Deploy scanners to scan the mysterious glyphs in mines and caves. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Deploy Scanners in a 22+ zone

MainQuests.name: A Harrowing Journey Of Drumming
MainQuests.description: Steel Wool needs a new drummer. Destroy jukeboxes for the parts needed to build a new drummer. Most often found in Thunder Route 99 zones.

objectives.description: Gather parts from destroyed jukeboxes in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: Canny Crude!
MainQuests.description: Help Syd survey Canny Valley by gathering crude oil samples from abandoned oil rigs. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Collect Oil Samples in a 22+ zone

MainQuests.name: Band Probation
MainQuests.description: Investigate the strange land periscopes reported in the desert. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Find Periscopes in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: Ready To Rock
MainQuests.description: Syd is tracking a possible mass extinction event in the past. Help him gather the rock samples from the tornado-shaped rocks in the area. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Gather Rock Samples in a 22+ zone

MainQuests.name: Road Trip
MainQuests.description: Kick off the Thunder Route 99 roadtrip with some exploration. Visit a diner, motel, gas station, and a truck stop. Can be only completed in a Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Visit a diner in a 22+ zone
Visit a motel in a 22+ zone
Visit a gas station in a 22+ zone
Visit a truck stop in a 22+ zone

MainQuests.name: Stalled Out
MainQuests.description: Search the abandoned cars of Thunder Route 99 for clues.

objectives.description: Search Cars in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: See You Later
MainQuests.description: SEE-bot is driving everyone at Homebase insane. Deploy SEE-bot for critical updates. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Update SEE-bot in a 22+ zone

MainQuests.name: Say Watt?
MainQuests.description: Gather data from old servers left at the empty underground bases. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Search Servers in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: What Are Names?
MainQuests.description: Follow the trail of survey equipment to find Lars' former bandmate, Syd. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Find Survey Equipment in a 22+ zone

MainQuests.name: The Cyclone Of Your Love
MainQuests.description: Help Syd prepare for a potential reunion by collecting Steel Wool songbooks. Most often found in Thunder Route 99 zones.

objectives.description: Collect Songbooks in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: It's Showtime
MainQuests.description: We need to find Anthony before the husks do. Follow the trail posts and search for clues. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Find Trail Posts in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: Thar She Tumbles
MainQuests.description: We're unable to pinpoint Gravestone's location from homebase. We'll have to find another way. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Collect Tumbleweed Movement Data in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: My Dearest Sophie
MainQuests.description: Before we face the Legendary Gunslinger husk, we'd better learn more about Blackboot Ayers. Search the area for eyewitness accounts of Ayers' reign of terror. Look for old watertowers and windmills. Can be only completed in a desert or Thunder Route 99 zone.

objectives.description: Find Old Diary Pages in a 24+ zone

MainQuests.name: Through the Rift
MainQuests.description: Bring Carlos back from the other side. Stabilize the Rift!

objectives.description: Complete the Stabilize the Rift mission in a 28+ zone

MainQuests.name: Blue Skies
MainQuests.description: Find out what happened here. Explore a ghost town zone.

objectives.description: Fully explore a Ghost Town zone in a successful mission

MainQuests.name: Evacuate Immediately!
MainQuests.description: Earthquake's coming! Evacuate the Shelters in the earthquake zone.

objectives.description: Complete an Evacuate the Shelter mission in a 28+ zone

MainQuests.name: El Jefe
MainQuests.description: Help Carlos and Lars settle the score with a winner take all game of Jefe.

objectives.description: Gather cards in a 28+ Ghost Town zone

MainQuests.name: Seventeen
MainQuests.description: Collect stagecoaches to build a SEE-Bot search caravan.

objectives.description: Search for coaches in a 26+ Ghost Town zone

MainQuests.name: Fool and His Gold
MainQuests.description: Deploy auto-gold-sieves on the streams in the canyons to gather fool's gold for Desiree.

objectives.description: Deploy auto-gold-sieves in a 28+ Ghost Town zone

MainQuests.name: Mercerado!

MainQuests.description: Retrieve oil lanterns for Desiree.

MainQuests.name: Eye Candy
MainQuests.description: Flip over bathtubs to create SEE-Bot traps.

MainQuests.name: Battle Royal
MainQuests.description: Enter the portal and deliver the ultimate bomb.

MainQuests.name: Remote Control

objectives.description: Deploy the probe

MainQuests.name: Have You Tried Turning It On and Off Again?

objectives.description: Eliminate Riot Shield Huskies in a 30+ zone

MainQuests.name: How I Wonder What You Are

MainQuests.name: A Bonding Experience

objectives.description: Collect motorcycles in a 30+ Thunder Route 99 zone

MainQuests.name: Smashasaurus

TutorialQuests.name: Collections
TutorialQuests.description:
Commander, you may want to consider retiring some of your heroes, personnel, and schematics to make room for new recruits and weapon innovations.

Slotting people and schematics will remove them from action. However, once you complete a collection category, you will receive new rewards! Visit the Armory tab to put an item in your Collection Book.

objectives.description: Level Up Your Collection Book

TutorialQuests.name: Defender Training - Stage 1
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Command tab to level up a Defender of your choice.

objectives.description: Level Up a Defender

TutorialQuests.name: Defender Training - Stage 2
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Command tab to evolve a Defender of your choice. Evolved Defenders are more powerful.

objectives.description: Evolve a Defender by 1 Star

TutorialQuests.name: Hero Training - Stage 1
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Command tab to level up a Hero of your choice.

objectives.description: Level Up a Hero

TutorialQuests.name: Hero Training - Stage 2
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Command tab to evolve a Hero of your choice. Evolved Heroes are more powerful.

objectives.description: Evolve a Hero by 1 Star

TutorialQuests.name: Hero Rarity Upgrade
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Command tab to upgrade the rarity of a Hero. Upgrading the rarity of Heroes makes them more powerful.

objectives.description: Upgrade the Rarity of a Hero

TutorialQuests.name: Perk Replacement
TutorialQuests.description:
You have unlocked access to the Perk Recombobulator.

Visit the Armory tab to replace a Perk on a schematic of your choice.

objectives.description: Replace a Perk

TutorialQuests.name: Perk Upgrade
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Armory tab to upgrade a Perk on a schematic of your choice.

objectives.description: Upgrade a Perk

TutorialQuests.name: Weapon Enhancement
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Armory tab to level up a Weapon of your choice.

objectives.description: Level Up a Weapon

TutorialQuests.name: Weapon/Trap Evolution
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Armory tab to evolve a Weapon or Trap of your choice. Evolved Weapons and Traps are more powerful and may require rare crafting ingredients.

objectives.description: Evolve a Weapon or Trap by 1 Star

TutorialQuests.name: Survivor Training - Stage 1
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Command tab to level up a Survivor of your choice. Leveled up Survivors will increase your Homebase power.

objectives.description: Level Up a Survivor

TutorialQuests.name: Survivor Training - Stage 2
TutorialQuests.description: Visit the Command tab to evolve a Survivor of your choice. Evolved Survivors will increase your Homebase power.

objectives.description: Evolve a Survivor by 1 Star

TutorialQuests.name: Expeditions
TutorialQuests.description:
Well done, Commander! You can now send your Heroes on Expeditions. If an Expedition is successful, you receive rewards! Your Heroes will need People and Vehicles to accompany them. Expeditions take time to complete and are not guaranteed to succeed.

Visit the Command tab to assign your Heroes on an Expedition. After an Expedition has been completed, go back to the Expeditions Squads tab and see if it was successful!

objectives.description: Complete an Expedition

TutorialQuests.name: Research
TutorialQuests.description:
Research allows you to upgrade your technologies. These new technologies cost Research Points. You earn Research Points over time. Collect enough Research Points to purchase the Fortitude Research Node.

To unlock the Fortitude Research Node:
Select the Skills tab
Select Research: Tier 1
Select the Fortitude Research node
Select Purchase to unlock the node

objectives.description: Purchase Fortitude Research Node

TutorialQuests.name: Fire Team Alpha Worker (Slot)
TutorialQuests.description:
Well done, Commander! You have unlocked the first Fire Team Alpha Worker slot. Slotting a Survivor in this slot will increase your Homebase Power.

To assign one of your Survivors to your Fire Team Alpha Squad:
Select the Squads tab
Select the Survivor Squads tab
Select Fire Team Alpha
Select the 1st Fire Team Alpha Worker slot
Select a Survivor to slot

objectives.description: Assign a Survivor to the 1st Fire Team Alpha slot

TutorialQuests.name: (Hidden) EMT Worker (Unlock)
TutorialQuests.description: Quest to track unlock the EMT Worker skill tree node.

objectives.description: Unlock EMT Worker Skill Tree Node

TutorialQuests.description: Quest to track unlock the Expeditions skill tree node.

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Tele-Fortation
LimitedTimeEvent.description:
Now it's time for you and your team to defend your deployable bases and eradicate the enemy!

Make sure you build weapons, ammo, and traps! You don't have much time or resources!

Once you're ready, access the Control Panel, select Tier 7 or higher difficulty, and let the battle begin!

objectives.description: Complete a Tier 7 (or higher) of Operation Block Party

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Base in the Box
LimitedTimeEvent.description:
The husks are plotting a large scale assault, and we need to take them by surprise.

Join up with other Commanders, build a base you can deploy to designated zones, and battle!

objectives.description: Build a Deployable Base in Operation Block Party with 10 or more structures

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Operation Block Party (Unlock)
LimitedTimeEvent.description:
Commander, your squad has done a great job in Stonewood battling husks and saving survivors. However, Operation Block Party needs your immediate attention! 

To unlock Operation Block Party: 
Select the Skills tab
Select the Operation Block Party skill node
Select purchase to unlock the skill node

objectives.description: Unlock Operation Block Party Skill Tree Node

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Mutant Storms
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Storms are rapidly spreading. Look at all that purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mutant Storm missions in a 30+ zone

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Storm Alert!
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Storms are rapidly spreading. Look at all that purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mutant Storm missions

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Hydraulic Weapon Evolution
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Visit the Armory tab to evolve a Hydraulic Weapon of your choice. Evolved Weapons are more powerful and may require rare crafting ingredients.

objectives.description: Evolve a Hydraulic Weapon by 1 Star

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Form of... Llama!
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Survive the Storm and earn your very own Storm Llama. Earn Storm Tickets by successfully completing missions in Mutant Storm missions. You can also earn Storm Tickets by completing Survive the Storm missions.

objectives.description: Purchase a Storm Llama from the Loot tab

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Enraged

objectives.description: Complete 5 Medium Threat (or higher) Missions in Canny Valley

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Fight Pumpkin with Pumpkin
LimitedTimeEvent.description: The crisp fall air must be emboldening the husks. Apparently, jack o' lanterns werent enough for these monsters. Now theyre hoarding candy. Get out there and clear some husk encampments!

objectives.description: Clear 6 Husk Encampments in High Threat (or higher) Stonewood
Complete 2 High Threat (or higher) Missions in Stonewood

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Grim Harvest
LimitedTimeEvent.description: For every pumpkin husk we smash, two more appear! We need to get to the root of the situation before were overrun. Collect any glowing pumpkins you see. We need to do some research.

objectives.description: Collect 10 Pumpkin Heads in Stonewood
Complete 2 Low Threat (or higher) Missions in Stonewood

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Lobber Hunt
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Its a destructive season, Commander. Time to create Pumpkin Warheads. You will need them to create the Jack-O-Launcher schematic. Go to the Vault, select Transform, and then select the Pumpkin Warhead. You will need to consume some items and candy to make them. Once you have created enough Pumpkin Warheads, select Transform and create the Jack-O-Launcher schematic. Once you've crafted the Jack-O-Launcher, go fight the Lobbers!

objectives.description: Craft the Jack-O-Launcher
Eliminate 6 Lobbers in Very High Threat Stonewood with a Jack-O-Launcher
Complete 1 Very High Threat Mission in Stonewood

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Secrets Taken to the Grave
LimitedTimeEvent.description: As I suspected, these pumpkins are evil. Which gives me an idea. If you can find missing step of the Jack-O-Launcher schematic, you can build the perfect weapon. Try looking somewhere spooky like the suburbs.

objectives.description: Search Gravestones for the Epitaph in Stonewood
Complete 3 High Threat (or higher) Missions in Stonewood

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Pumpkin Head
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Weve got reports of husks wearing costumes and its really, really bad for morale. Sacking our planet was one thing, but getting in the holiday spirit? Its bumming everyone out. Get out there and smash those pumpkin heads!

objectives.description: Eliminate 20 Pumpkin Husks in Stonewood
Complete 2 Missions in Stonewood

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Fright Zone
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Now that we've defeated the Lobbers in Stonewood, let's take the fight to the husks in Plankerton.

objectives.description: Complete 5 Medium Threat (or higher) Missions in Plankerton

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Trick or Treat
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Survivors need us now more than ever, Commander. Let's rescue them. Rumor has it, they have some candy.

objectives.description: Save 15 Survivors
Complete 3 Medium Threat (or higher) Missions in Stonewood

LimitedTimeEvent.name: We're Back!
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Thank you for your patience. Complete Homebase Storm Shield Defense 1 to collect your reward!

objectives.description: Complete Homebase Storm Shield Defense 1

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Fortnite for a Fortnight
LimitedTimeEvent.description:
Survive the Storm for 14 days in a Power 15 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 14 Day Survive the Storm mission in a 10 zone

LimitedTimeEvent.name: True Survivor
LimitedTimeEvent.description:
Make it like a True Survivor! Survive a 14 Day mission in a Power 40 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 14 Day Survive the Storm mission in a 20 zone

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Mission Literally Impossible
LimitedTimeEvent.description:
A 14 Day mission in a Power 70 zone? It cant be done!

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 14 Day Survive the Storm mission in a 30 zone

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Freestyle Storm Survival
LimitedTimeEvent.description:
Successfully complete a Survive the Storm mission in any threat level.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 3, 7, or 14 day Survive the Storm mission

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Nite Fever
LimitedTimeEvent.description:
Successfully complete Survive the Storm missions in any threat level.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete 3 Survive the Storm missions

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Whatever Gets You Through the Nite
LimitedTimeEvent.description:
Successfully complete Survive the Storm missions in a Power 40 or higher zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete 7 Survive the Storm missions in a 20+ zone

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Mistakes Were Made
LimitedTimeEvent.description: So, that cool new hydraulic weapon update everyones talking about It got slightly deleted. But, dont worry,  if you can collect some hydraulic pistol parts we should be able to recreate a prototype from memory.

objectives.description: Collect hydraulic pistol parts by harvesting mechanical objects

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Ctrl Assault Delete
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Part of the Hydraulic Weapons update was deleted. If you can collect hydraulic rifle parts we should be able to recreate one of the missing prototypes from memory.

objectives.description: Collect hydraulic rifle parts by harvesting mechanical objects

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Drawing a Blank
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Part of the Hydraulic Weapons update was deleted. If you can collect hydraulic rifle parts we should be able to recreate one of the missing prototypes from memory.

objectives.description: Collect hydraulic sniper parts by harvesting large vehicles

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Post Apocalyptic Warfare
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Let's make a new weapon! Scavenge some parts from marked dumpsters, often found in City zones

objectives.description: Scavenge parts from marked dumpsters

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Scavenged Parts
LimitedTimeEvent.description: We need to scavenge parts for our new weapon. Gather scavenged parts by harvesting junk, often found in Industrial zones

objectives.description: Gather scavenged parts by harvesting junk

LimitedTimeEvent.name: Storm King Pin
LimitedTimeEvent.description: Congratulations! You have defeated the Storm King! Check your email over the next several days for information on getting a physical Storm King Pin!

LTE_Anniversary2018.name: Piece of Cake
LTE_Anniversary2018.description: Celebrate a year of Fortnite with some delicious cake! Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Find birthday cakes

LTE_Anniversary2018.name: Sploding Husks
LTE_Anniversary2018.description: Put an end to the Husk celebrations. Take out those Cake Sploders!

objectives.description: Eliminate Cake Sploders

HeroQuests.name: Back Against the Wall
HeroQuests.description: Your Constructor is almost ready for a mission. Assign your Constructor to your Hero Squad. Then, select your Constructor and select Level Up.

objectives.description: Complete a mission as a Constructor in a 3+ zone

HeroQuests.name: Doing the Bull Dance
HeroQuests.description: Commander, let's send your Constructor on more missions. It's time for some more ability training.

objectives.description: Activate the Bull Rush Ability
Build a Floor for your B.A.S.E. as a Constructor
Activate B.A.S.E. Ability
Complete a mission as a Constructor in a 3+ zone

HeroQuests.name: Search and Rescue
HeroQuests.description: A Constructor is needed more than ever, Commander. A worker went missing recently in the storm. A Radar Tower needs to be built, so we can find and rescue the worker. Have your Constructor build it and bring that worker home!

objectives.description: Build a Radar Tower in a successful mission as a Constructor in a 3+ zone

HeroQuests.name: Enter the Ninja
HeroQuests.description: A ninja watches from the distance! Demonstrate your superior combat skills to recruit the deadly assassin!

objectives.description: Eliminate 20 Husks with a Melee Weapon

HeroQuests.name: Praying Mantis
HeroQuests.description: Your Ninja is ready to achieve the next level of enlightenment. Level up your Ninja, and continue your ability training.

objectives.description: Activate the Throwing Stars Ability
Activate the Mantis Leap Ability
Complete 3 missions as a Ninja in a 5+ zone

HeroQuests.name: To Boldly Go...
HeroQuests.description: Explore the world to recruit an Outlander.

objectives.description: Fully explore a 3+ zone in a successful mission

HeroQuests.name: Fragments 'O Plenty
HeroQuests.description: Level up your Outlander, and continue your ability training.

objectives.description: Collect an Outlander Fragment and Activate an Outlander Fragment Ability
Complete 3 missions as an Outlander in a 5+ zone

HeroQuests.name: Kill or Be Killed
HeroQuests.description: Soldier time! Level up your Soldier, arm your Assault Rifle. Eliminate some husks!

objectives.description: Eliminate 100 Husks with an Assault Rifle as a Soldier

HeroQuests.name: Fire in the Hole
HeroQuests.description: Your Soldier can shoot a rifle. But can your Soldier effectively use grenades? Let's find out!

objectives.description: Eliminate 10 Husks with Frag Grenades

HeroQuests.name: If You Build It
HeroQuests.description: If we're gonna attract the best Constructors to our cause, we're gonna have to build far and wide.

objectives.description: Complete 3 missions as a Constructor in a 24+ zone

HeroQuests.name: Knock 'Em Down
HeroQuests.description: Commander, let's send your Constructor on more missions to teach the new folks what constructing's all about.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Husks as a Constructor in 26+ zones

HeroQuests.name: There is only Ninja
HeroQuests.description: A lone Ninja is dangerous, but TWO Ninjas? Imagine the power! Go find us another Ninja, Commander.

objectives.description: Complete 3 missions as a Ninja in a 24+ zone

HeroQuests.name: Heart of Shadow
HeroQuests.description: A Ninja in the hand is worth two in Canny Valley. Or something like that. It's time to recruit another heroic Ninja!

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Husks as a Ninja in 26+ zones

HeroQuests.name: Outlandish
HeroQuests.description: Outlanders are out there, waiting in the... out... lands?

objectives.description: Complete 3 missions as an Outlander in a 24+ zone

HeroQuests.name: Far Out Possibilities
HeroQuests.description: We're going to need to find more Outlanders to keep the materials flowing, Commander!

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Husks as an Outlander in 26+ zones

HeroQuests.name: One with the Gun
HeroQuests.description: Can you attract new soldiers to our cause, Commander? Show 'em what we're made of!

objectives.description: Complete 3 missions as a Soldier in a 24+ zone

HeroQuests.name: The Huskinator
HeroQuests.description: There are still worthy soldiers out there, among the husks. Go find them, Commander.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Husks as a Soldier in 26+ zones

HeroQuests.name: Leaf No Man Behind
HeroQuests.description: Help rescue 9 of your fellow troop members who have gotten stranded across Autumn Foothills.

objectives.description: Rescue 9 survivors scattered across the Autumn Foothills

HeroQuests.name: Shoot for the High Score!
HeroQuests.description: Find and play the Jess branded Battle Breakers Arcade cabinets (often found in City zones)!

objectives.description: Play Jess Branded Battle Breakers Arcade Cabinets

HeroQuests.name: Climbing the Leaderboard!
HeroQuests.description: Find and play the Kyle branded Battle Breakers Arcade cabinets (often found in City zones)!

objectives.description: Play Kyle Branded Battle Breakers Arcade Cabinets

HeroQuests.name: Blakebeard's Stash
HeroQuests.description: Prepare for plunder! Blakebeard is ready to teach you the secret to finding hidden treasure.

objectives.description: Find Treasure Stashes

HeroQuests.name: Back to Your Roots
HeroQuests.description: Show off our fall-inspired foraging abilities by harvesting mushrooms and giant roots in the Autumn Foothills.

objectives.description: Destroy giant tree roots and mushrooms

HeroQuests.name: The Harder They Fall
HeroQuests.description: Flex your combat skills by eliminating Mist Monsters in any mission in the Autumn Foothills.

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters in the Autumn Foothills

HeroQuests.name: Queen Sweep
HeroQuests.description: Prove your scouting skills and locate a new secretive hero by fully exploring an Autumn Foothills map.

objectives.description: Explore 100% of an Autumn Foothills map

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.name: Sploding Husks
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.description: Put an end to the Husk celebrations. Take out those Cake Sploders!

objectives.description: Eliminate Cake Sploders

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.name: Cooling Off
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.description: The heat wave is picking up. Bring in survivors so they can cool off and kick it with the rest of Homebase!

objectives.description: Rescue survivors

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.name: Beat the Heat
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.description: This summer is a hot one and someone at Homebase broke the air conditioning! Collect air conditioning parts to cool everyone off.

objectives.description: Harvest air conditioner units to collect their parts

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.name: Start the Show!
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.description: Start the celebration and light off them fireworks!

objectives.description: Light off fireworks

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.name: Party Decor
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.description: What's a party without some great decorations?

objectives.description: Collect flamingo lawn ornaments

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.name: Misty Meddlers
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.description: Those Mist Monsters always seem to want to crash our parties. Show them the door and take em' out!

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters of any type

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.name: Towel Off!
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.description: There's yet another soggy emergency on the pool deck! Find some towels!

objectives.description: Collect pool towels

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.name: Keepin' It Cool!
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_Generic.description: What better way is there to celebrate summer and beat the heat than kicking back with a cool drink? Go get some ice.

objectives.description: Destroy ice machines, freezers, or refrigerators to collect ice

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Enter the Chrome Husky
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Chrome Husky Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate a Chrome Husky

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Don't Be Like Water Husks
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Water Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Water Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Water Husks

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: One with Nature Husks
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Nature Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Nature Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Nature Husks

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: When Fire Husks Start to Burn
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Fire Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Fire Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Fire Husks

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Mist Monster Bash
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Mist Monsters as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Mist Monsters

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Fortune and Glory
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, open as many caches as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. You can find caches in the world by killing Mini-Bosses or looting valuable treasure chests. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Open 10 Caches

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: One "Mini-Boss" at a Time
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Eliminate as many Epic Mini-Bosses as you can, Commander! Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate an Epic Mini-Boss in a Mini-Boss mission

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Meteoric Fall
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description:
Chrome husks, earthquakes, wed better destroy the meteorite before it strikes again. Stand by to deploy and defend our Anti-Meteorite Lasers.

Note: this quest cannot be completed until you complete "It came from Space!" quest.

objectives.description: Destroy The Meteorite

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Look Out!
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: We cant destroy a meteorite without lasers, and we cant make lasers without glass, so theres only one solution. Search for lightning glass by deploying SEE-bots in lightning rich environments.

objectives.description: Deploy SEE-bots

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Earthquakes!
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Is it just me, or have there been a lot of unexplained earthquakes since the meteorite landed? We should probably look into that. Deploy remote seismographs, and Ill analyze the data.

objectives.description: Deploy Remote Seismographs

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Post Credits
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Replies are piling up from Lok's superhero job posting. Search mailboxes to find a true hero.

objectives.description: Search Mailboxes

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Don't Blink
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: We need glass to build our lasers. Collect SEE-bots to search for evidence of lightning glass.

objectives.description: Collect SEE-bots

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Magnets!
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: The Cloaked Star might have a solution for the Chrome Husk infestation. Stand by to deploy magnetic snares!

objectives.description: Deploy Magnetic Snares

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Renegade Rampage
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: It looks like there's a new vigilante in town. Follow the path of destruction and search for clues for the vigilante's identity.

objectives.description: Follow The Trail Of Destruction

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Jack Of All Trades
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Homebase plumbing is crisis waiting to happen. Help Jack collect everything we need to stave off disaster. Look for portable toilets in the Industrial Zones.

objectives.description: Collect Neutralizer Fluid

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Fallen Star
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Whether he wants it or not, The Cloaked Star needs our help. Search the zone, we need to find him before its too late!

objectives.description: Rescue The Cloaked Star

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Every Film Bed, Woof!
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: The Cloaked Star has been smashing gravestones. We should probably look into that.

objectives.description: Search Smashed Gravestones

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Space Rocks
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: We're closing in on the landing site. Search the zone for the crater, deploy scanning equipment, and get ready to fight!

objectives.description: Deploy and Defend Scanners

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Sharp Dressed Plan
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Were ready to field test Spitfires suit. Deploy the suit in a combat setting, and prepare to fight.

objectives.description: Test The Suit

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Ooze Control
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Spitfire is missing, and toxic waste barrels are popping up in unexpected places. Search the barrels and discover the connection.

objectives.description: Search Barrels

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: The Powers That Bee
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Some heroes aren't born, they're made. Eliminate Bee Hive husks and collect corrupted beehive pieces for Lok's super experiment.

objectives.description: Eliminate Beehive Husks And Collect Corrupted Beehive Pieces.

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: We Interrupt This Broadcast...
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: The TVs around the world are broadcasting ominous messages. We need to investigate - destroy the TVs and collect corrupted receivers to understand what is happening. Something is corrupting the receivers, but it is not the storm. TVs are most often found in Suburban and Urban zones.

objectives.description: Collect Television Receivers

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Carbon Dating
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: We should check to see if the chrome husks are from the future. Just to be sure. Collect a sample for carbon dating.

objectives.description: Collect Sample

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Sometimes They Come Back
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: We've got new monsters! Take out Chrome Husks and collect samples for analysis.

objectives.description: Collect Chrome Husk Data

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Handshake
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Help Dennis prove the existence of time skips by collecting clock parts. Clocks are most often found in Urban and Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Collect Clocks

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: It Came From Space!
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: We should probably investigate that massive explosion. Search the zone for any signs of the meteorite.

objectives.description: Collect Meteorite Shards

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Project Tailor
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: The cure for Spitfires illness may be hidden in the Vindertech archives. Help Ray track down audio logs related to Vindertechs first armored suit prototype. Look for system terminals in Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find Project Tailor Files

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: I Have No Voice and I Must Moo
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Lok isnt ready to lead the way, but he still deserves a voice. Collect farm sounds to give him the voice pack of his dreams.

objectives.description: Collect Farm Sounds

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Bee Gone
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Help Ray collect fans to clear the bees from Homebase. Found inside houses and buildings.

objectives.description: Collect Fans

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Super Flyers
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: You can't battle a mysterious space rock without a team of super-powered superheroes! Let's let the superhero community know we're recruiting!

objectives.description: Launch Flyers

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Independence Day
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Celebrate the independence of our Home Base with a display of festive fireworks!

objectives.description: Launch Fireworks

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Sleep On It
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: We've saved so many survivors we're running out of beds. Search the area for suitable mattresses. Beds are mostly found in Suburban and Urban zones.

objectives.description: Collect Mattresses

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Ray Of Hope
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: It's time for Lok's reign of terror to come to an end. Deploy searchlights to call Ray back to Homebase.

objectives.description: Deploy Lights

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Taste Wizard
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: The Taste Wizard predictive ordering network has been corrupted by the storm. Help Dennis destroy Taste Wizard before it destroys us all. The restaurants are most often found in Urban zones.

objectives.description: Upload Dennis Order

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Ex-Ray
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: We have the Project Tailor plans! Start collecting the materials well need to build the suit as we listen to the audio logs. The high density rubber can be found in Industrial and Urban zones.

objectives.description: Collect High Density Rubber

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Malevolent Presence
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Deploy scanners to test Dennis theory about a rogue network coming online.

objectives.description: Deploy Scanners

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Ready-to-war
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: If we understood more about Shield Husks, wed be able to improve the shielding in Spitfires suit. Collect Shielder Husk data.

objectives.description: Collect Shielder Data

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Blocked!
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: We almost have everything we need to complete Spitfires suit. Collect stainless steel as we sort through the last of the Project Tailor audio logs. This quest requires an Industrial zone.

objectives.description: Destroy Tank Trucks To Collect Steel

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Baby Daddy
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Collect stuffed animals to prepare Dennis for the biggest journey of his life. Toys are most often found in Suburban and Urban zones.

objectives.description: Collect Stuffed Animals

LTE_Blockbuster2018.name: Lie to Me
LTE_Blockbuster2018.description: Its time to find out if Raven can be trusted. Search the zone for everything we need to build a lie detector. Look for a hospital, which is most likely to be found in the Urban zone.

objectives.description: Collect Testing Equipment

LTE_Bot.name: Ray-Bot Rampage
LTE_Bot.description: Take cover! Ray-Bot is armed, dangerous, and ready for action.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks

LTE_Bot.name: No Cameras Please
LTE_Bot.description: Ray's ready to take her first step into battle, but it's not going to be pretty.

objectives.description: Deactivate surveillance cameras

LTE_Bot.name: Lone Wolf-bot
LTE_Bot.description: With the rest of the Homebase Crew joining the fight, Ray faces a difficult choice.

objectives.description: Collect movies

LTE_Brainstorm.name: A Dark and Brainstormy Night
LTE_Brainstorm.description: The Door to Darkness is re-opening. Willow needs your help investigating who or what's behind it!

objectives.description: Search the Haunted Hotel for clues

LTE_Brainstorm.name: Well Well Well...
LTE_Brainstorm.description: After falling into a well, Dennis must come to terms with his greatest fears.

objectives.description: Search wells in Hexsylvania and eliminate Takers.

LTE_Brainstorm.name: The Heat of Paddle
LTE_Brainstorm.description: Spooky stories can always be improved with a campfire! Hint: Best found in Haunted Forest or Swamp zones. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Light 6 Campfires

LTE_Brainstorm.name: Fill 'er Up
LTE_Brainstorm.description: Refresh Brainstorms brine and return him to his normal brain monster state.

objectives.description: Gather new Brain Brine from lab equipment.

LTE_Brainstorm.name: Jar-Related Consequences
LTE_Brainstorm.description: Foil Brainstorm's spooky plan by battling the Door to Darkness!

objectives.description: Fight through the haunted hotel basement.

LTE_Brainstorm.name: Don't Quoth Me
LTE_Brainstorm.description: Lars leads the team into zombie chicken combat with a spooky story.

objectives.description: Eliminate Zombie Chickens in Hexsylvania.

LTE_Brainstorm.name: It's All Gravey
LTE_Brainstorm.description: Discover Willow's greatest fear by helping her track down and destroy some ominously named tombstones...

objectives.description: Destroy Tombstones

LTE_Brainstorm.name: Girlbossurtunity
LTE_Brainstorm.description: Those last stories were childs play. Sarahs got a REAL scary story to share.

objectives.description: Deliver boxes of loungewear to unsuspecting citizens.

LTE_HordeBash.name: Leave No Stone Unturned
LTE_HordeBash.description:
Well done, Commander! You can now send your Heroes on Expeditions. If an Expedition is successful, you receive rewards! Your Heroes will need People and Vehicles to accompany them. Expeditions take time to complete and are not guaranteed to succeed.

Visit the Command tab to assign your Heroes on an Expedition.
After an Expedition has been completed, go back to the Expeditions Squads tab and see if it was successful!

objectives.description: Successfully complete 5 Expeditions

LTE_HordeBash.name: Perpetual Storms
LTE_HordeBash.description: These storms are relentless and spreading! Look for purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Mutant Storm missions

LTE_HordeBash.name: Scavenger Weapon Evolution
LTE_HordeBash.description: Visit the Armory tab to evolve a Scavenger Weapon of your choice. Evolved Weapons are more powerful and may require rare crafting ingredients.

objectives.description: Evolve a Scavenger Weapon by 1 Star

LTE_HordeBash.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 1
LTE_HordeBash.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 500 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in a 5+ zone

LTE_HordeBash.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 10
LTE_HordeBash.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1500 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in a 24+ zone

LTE_HordeBash.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 6
LTE_HordeBash.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1000 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in a 16+ zone

LTE_HordeBash.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 7
LTE_HordeBash.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1250 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in a 18+ zone

LTE_HordeBash.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 8
LTE_HordeBash.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1250 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in a 20+ zone

LTE_HordeBash.name: Die, Husks, Die! - Stage 9
LTE_HordeBash.description: Put your Scavenger Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of storm creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1500 Husks with a Scavenger Weapon in a 22+ zone

LTE_HordeBash.name: One Commander's Collection Is...
LTE_HordeBash.description:
Commander, you may want to consider retiring more of your heroes, personnel, and schematics to your Collection Book. If you can level up your Collection Book to 30, you will receive additional scavenger rewards!

Remember, slotting people and schematics will remove them from action. However, once you complete a collection category, you will receive new rewards! Visit the Armory tab to level up your Collection Book.

objectives.description: Level Up Your Collection Book to 30

LTE_HordeBash.name: Another Commander's Treasure
LTE_HordeBash.description:
Commander, you may want to consider retiring more of your heroes, personnel, and schematics to your Collection Book. If you can level up your Collection Book to 50, you will receive additional scavenger rewards!

Remember, slotting people and schematics will remove them from action. However, once you complete a collection category, you will receive new rewards! Visit the Armory tab to level up your Collection Book.

objectives.description: Level Up Your Collection Book to 50

LTE_HordeBash.name: Scavenger Weapon Enhancement
LTE_HordeBash.description: Visit the Armory tab to level up a Scavenger Weapon of your choice.

objectives.description: Level Up a Scavenger Weapon

LTE_HordeBash.name: Mission Alert! (Constructor)
LTE_HordeBash.description: Calling all Constructors! Your building skills are needed. Complete missions with the clock icon for additional rewards.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mission Alerts as a Constructor

LTE_HordeBash.name: Mission Alert! (Ninja)
LTE_HordeBash.description: Calling all Ninjas! Your martial arts are needed. Complete missions with the clock icon for additional rewards.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mission Alerts as a Ninja

LTE_HordeBash.name: Mission Alert! (Outlander)
LTE_HordeBash.description: Calling all Outlanders! Your exploration skills are needed. Complete missions with the clock icon for additional rewards.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mission Alerts as an Outlander

LTE_HordeBash.name: Mission Alert! (Soldier)
LTE_HordeBash.description: Calling all Soldiers! Your combat skills are needed. Complete missions with the clock icon for additional rewards.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mission Alerts as a Soldier

LTE_HordeBash.name: Scrounge Up
LTE_HordeBash.description: Scrounge up and save! Earn your very own Scavenger Llama by successfully completing Expeditions and Limited Time Event Quests.

objectives.description: Purchase a Scavenger Llama from the Loot tab

LTE_HordeBash.name: Power 76 Horde Challenge
LTE_HordeBash.description:
The Horde is on the march! Deploy your portable Fort and get ready to fight!

Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Complete Challenge 10 in a 76+ Power zone

LTE_Fennix.name: To Trust a Fox
LTE_Fennix.description: Clear encampments in any mission while Homebase decides what to do with the trickster.

objectives.description: Clear Husk Encampments

LTE_Fennix.name: Rebranding
LTE_Fennix.description: Deliver fliers to survivors to inform them of Homebase's new brand. Mailboxes are commonly found in Suburban and City zones.

objectives.description: Deliver fliers to survivors.

LTE_Fennix.name: Rebuilding
LTE_Fennix.description: Homebase needs to rebuild after a recent unfortunate series of events. Build radar towers in any mission to fix the radar network.

objectives.description: Build radar towers.

LTE_Fennix.name: We've Been Robbed!
LTE_Fennix.description: Complete a Ride the Lightning mission to help Lars gather info on Fennix's location.

objectives.description: Complete a Ride the Lightning mission.

LTE_Fennix.name: The Fox Hunt
LTE_Fennix.description: Fennix has robbed Homebase. Use the FOX-SEE-BOT to locate where he has run off to.

objectives.description: Use FOX-SEE-BOT to locate Fennix.

LTE_Fennix.name: Survey Says...
LTE_Fennix.description: Fennix needs to learn what the people think of Homebase. Rescue survivors in any mission and poll their opinions.

objectives.description: Rescue and interview survivors.

LTE_Fennix.name: Evaluation Period
LTE_Fennix.description: Fennix wants to know what he's working with. Show him how it's done and eliminate husks in any mission!

objectives.description: Eliminate husks.

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Hexsylvanian Gothic
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Explore Hexsylvania's Gothic Ruins in successful missions.

objectives.description: Explore 6 Gothic Ruins in Hexsylvania missions.

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Memories of Someone Special
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Even in the shadow of Vlad's storm, there is still light. A kind, talented, and driven artist once lived in this land. Collect the fragments of her composition, and return her music to Hexsylvania.

objectives.description: Find 5 fragments of a music piece in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Lok's Book of Monsters: Vampire Takers
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Is it just me, or are the takers here a little vampirey? Eliminate some Vampire Takers, and collect samples.

objectives.description: Collect 15 data samples from Vampire Takers in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Pumpkin Head
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: We've got reports of husks wearing costumes and its really, really bad for morale. Get out there and smash those pumpkin heads! HINT: Pumpkin Head Husks are found in Hexsylvania Venture zones.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Pumpkin Husks in Hexsylvania Venture missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Stakeout
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Find and destroy Storm's recreation of the ancient Hexsylvanian tyrant!  Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Eliminate Vlad

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Legendary Monster Bash!
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Complete the Hexsylvania Quest line.

objectives.description: Complete Loot Drop Quest

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Epic Monster Bash!
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Complete the Hex Files Quest in Hexsylvania.

objectives.description: Complete Hex Files Quest

LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Explore Hexsylvania and complete as many missions as you dare!

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Outlander Monster Rumble!
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: The air itself is filled with mist monsters! Lets see what Bloodfinder A.C. can do against them!

objectives.description: Eliminate 30 Mist Monsters as Bloodfinder A.C.

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Bloodfinder A.C. Training
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Visit the Command tab to level up Bloodfinder A.C..

objectives.description: Level Up Bloodfinder A.C. to Level 20

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Bat Out of Bell
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: We've got a bat problem. Send those bats a message by destroying any Hexsylvanian bells you find.

objectives.description: Destroy 6 Large Bells in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: It's a Vlad Vlad Vlad Vlad World
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: There's something creepy going on with those Vlad statues. Let's knock 'em down!

objectives.description: Destroy 10 Vlad Statues in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Disintegration
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: I'm getting reports of graves with high levels of storm corruption. So... you know. Take care of that.

objectives.description: Destroy 4 Gothic Graves in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: The Evil Shed
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: The rickety Hexsylvanian shacks are a deathtrap for survivors. Let's clear as many as we can.

objectives.description: Destroy 12 Small Shacks in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: The Sting
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: We need to keep the bees from teaming up with the husks. Destroy any fancy bee huts you find!

objectives.description: Destroy 10 Bee huts in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Hxin'
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Explore the mists of Hexsylvania

objectives.description: Explore the mists of Hexsylvania

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Shadow Boxing
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Test the Storm Trap

objectives.description: Search for the ideal location to test the Storm Trap

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Hex Files
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Harvest any laboratory equipment you find. Maybe we can learn something from these amateur Hexsylvania scientists

objectives.description: Collect 20 notes by harvesting laboratory equipment in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Curse the Darkness
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Vlad supposedly created a powerful enchanted ore called Vladimantium. We could use some powerful enchanted ores! Collect some for analysis.

objectives.description: Collect 25 Vladamantium ingots by harvesting Chandeliers and Candelabras in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Vlad Luck
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: It wouldn't hurt to have a vampire detection system. Harvest mirrors to collect any mirror fragments.

objectives.description: Collect 13 Mirror Fragments by harvesting mirrors in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Aromatic for the People
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: We need to make sure any remaining survivors have a chance to fight back until we return. Start by collecting garlic.

objectives.description: Collect 12 Pristine Braids of Garlic by harvesting cupboards, shelves, and shacks in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Stakes, Well Done
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Collect wooden stakes for the survivor care packages.

objectives.description: Collect 30 Wooden Stakes by harvesting trees in Hexsylvania, requires successful missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Dungeons n' Dungeons
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Search the dungeons and catacombs and smash anything evil you see.

objectives.description: Destroy 8 Pieces of Dungeon Hardware in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Leaving Less Cages
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Let's do the survivors a favor and destroy any cages you find in the catacombs. I don't want those husks getting any ideas...

objectives.description: Destroy 10 Cages in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Dethrone
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: We want to keep the storm from finding anything that belonged to Vlad. Start by destroying any thrones you find.

objectives.description: Destroy 12 Thrones in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: The Eight
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: I cannot rule out a "Playing Chess with Death Scenario" here, so let's destroy any Chess Sets you find in Hexsylvania.

objectives.description: Destroy 8 Chess tables in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Stop Signs
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: The signs seem to be directing survivors to the most dangerous places imaginable. We should fix that.

objectives.description: Destroy 24 Signs in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Vampire Records
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: We need to let the survivors of Hexsylvania know we're here to help. Head out into the mist and spread the word!

objectives.description: Place 15 Gramophones in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Ashes to Ashes
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Legend has it, the entire historical record of Hexsylvania was burned. Search the grand fireplaces of Hexsylvania for any remnants.

objectives.description: Search 10 Grand Fireplaces in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Home of the Grave
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Find Vlad's coffin before the storm does.

objectives.description: Search stone coffins for Vlad's burial place in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: SEE-SAW
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Search for Vlad's final resting place by deploying SAW-Bots in Haunted Forests.

objectives.description: Deploy 5 SAW-Bots in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Loot Drop
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Distribute survival kits to give remaining survivors a fighting chance!

objectives.description: Place 15 Survival Kits in Hexsylvania missions

LTE_Fortnitemares.name: Interview with the Vlad Pyre
LTE_Fortnitemares.description: Deploy SAW-Bot at the Gothic Ruins in Hexsylvania.

objectives.description: Deploy the final SAW-Bot at the Gothic Ruins in Hexsylvania
Examine Vlad's coffin

LTE_Season11D.name: Dearly Departed
LTE_Season11D.description: Construct a luxury honeymoon RV wagon by salvaging old wagons in Hexsylvania. Hint: Best found in swamps. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Gather caravan wagons in Hexsylvania

LTE_Season11D.name: PitchTorch
LTE_Season11D.description: Save Arrlene from the husk mob. Take their torches away from them. Must be completed in Hexsylvania. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Eliminate torch-thrower pitchers and gather their torches

LTE_Season11D.name: Save The Date
LTE_Season11D.description: Water plants are a vital component to summon monsters. Harvest water plants in the swamps for the Summoning Soup. Hint: Best found in Hexsylvanian swamps. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy water plants to collect its flower

LTE_Season11D.name: What Mobs Do
LTE_Season11D.description: The villagers are agitated by Arrlene and may be assembling a mob. Destroy their boats to slow them down. Hint: Best found in Hexsylvanian swamps. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy boats in Hexsylvania

LTE_Season11D.name: Dear Di-arrrr-y
LTE_Season11D.description: Find and read the diary entries to learn more about Arrlene. Must be completed in Hexsylvania. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find Arrlene's diary entries

LTE_Season11D.name: Are We Calling it a Monster?
LTE_Season11D.description: Lightning rods are needed for the next step of Penny's plan. Deploy lightning rods in the area. Needs to be completed in Hexsylvania.  Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Deploy lightning rods in Hexsylvania

LTE_Season11D.name: Day 2
LTE_Season11D.description: Investigate clues to learn more about the hauntings in the hotel. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Investigate clues in the hotel

LTE_Season11D.name: Find Your Backbone
LTE_Season11D.description: Penny needs bags of... things. Gather bags from lab furniture because she pretty much needs it all. Needs to be completed in Hexsylvania.  Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy lab furniture to collect bags of things

LTE_Season11B.name: Get Packing
LTE_Season11B.description: Deploy wolfsbane amulets in Hexsylvania and restore peace to the land... for now. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Deploy wolfsbane amulets

LTE_Season11B.name: Wolf Me, Wolf Me Not
LTE_Season11B.description: Gather the wolfsbane plant leaves to deter the wolfpack. Hint: Best found in swamps. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy and collect wolfsbane plant leaves

LTE_Season11B.name: The Dire
LTE_Season11B.description: Help Dire through the Packstravaganza and get more info on the wolfpack's plans. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Deploy receivers in Hexsylvania

LTE_Season11B.name: Neighborhood Night Watch
LTE_Season11B.description: Interview sleeping vampires resting in their coffins to learn more about werewolves in Hexsylvania. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Give flasks to sleeping vampires in coffins

LTE_Season11B.name: Wakey Wakey
LTE_Season11B.description: Maybe vampires can help us solve our were-problems. Gather flasks from cabinets in Hexsylvania. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Destroy cabinets to collect flasks

LTE_Season11B.name: Blood Moon Rising
LTE_Season11B.description: Set up telescopes to observe and determine the exact moment of the Super Blood moon. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Deploy telescopes in Hexsylvania

LTE_Season11B.name: Where Wolf?
LTE_Season11B.description: Mysterious trees in Hexsylvania need to be investigated. Could they be signs of a Werewolf? Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Search for clawed trees in Hexsylvania

LTE_Season11C.name: OW. YOUR EYE.
LTE_Season11C.description: Join forces with the slashers by showing you can think like them. Use bladed weapons to eliminate enemies Hint: Use swords, scythes, or axes. Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Eliminate enemies using blade weapons

LTE_Season11C.name: Bury the Hatchet
LTE_Season11C.description: Grab some targets for hatchet throwing practice and attempt to make peace with the Slashers. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find targets for practice

LTE_Season11C.name: Dry Docked
LTE_Season11C.description: Gather paddles for slashers only canoe race. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find paddles for canoes

LTE_Season11C.name: Lurk Free Zone
LTE_Season11C.description: Gather backpacks and prepare for the No Lurking Challenge. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find backpacks for hiking

LTE_Season11C.name: What's a landline?
LTE_Season11C.description: A big camp fire is a great place for spooky stories. Destroy campfires to gather marshmallow sticks. Best completed in Shady Acres.

objectives.description: Destroy campfires to gather marshmallow sticks

LTE_Season11C.name: Notes From On The Ground
LTE_Season11C.description: Raven is ready to help translate old journal clippings from Slashers you can find in the wilderness. Hint: Cannot be completed in the Haunted Hotel.

objectives.description: Find journal clippings from Slashers

LTE_Season11C.name: Axes Of Evil
LTE_Season11C.description: Help survive the week at camp by destroying Slasher axes. Must be completed in Shady Acres.

objectives.description: Destroy slasher's axes in Shady Acres

LTE_Season11E.name: Day 7: Dear Ghost Diary
LTE_Season11E.description: Gather pages in the hotel which were torn from Willow's diary and discover how to help. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Collect Willow's diary entries

LTE_Season11E.name: Night 6: Nice Ghost
LTE_Season11E.description: Willow insists that the evil gnomes throughout the hotel be destroyed for everyone's safety. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Destroy evil gnomes in the hotel

LTE_Season11E.name: Night 5: Debnis
LTE_Season11E.description: It is time to communicate with the "ghost." Set up spirit boards to talk with Lok's imaginary friend. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Deploy spirit boards throughout the hotel

LTE_Season11E.name: Night 4: Hissing Contest
LTE_Season11E.description: The ghosts haunting the hotel are restless. Investigating where they took their final rest will lead to answers. Gather ghost ectoplasm samples from hotel beds. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Gather ghost ectoplasm samples from hotel beds

LTE_Season11E.name: Night 3: Leave This Place
LTE_Season11E.description: Legends about the hotel indicate that scary statues in the garden labyrinth may be the source of the hauntings. Investigate... or interrogate the statues. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Destroy scary statues in the garden labyrinth

LTE_Season11E.name: Night 2: Ghost Boss
LTE_Season11E.description: Investigate clues to learn more about the hauntings in the hotel. Must be completed during a Survive the Night mission.

objectives.description: Investigate clues in the hotel

LTE_Season11E.name: Night 1: Rumors of Ghost Activity
LTE_Season11E.description: Explore the haunted hotel and deploy sensors to measure the supernatural field.

objectives.description: Investigate the haunted hotel

LTE_Season11E.name: The Door To Darkness
LTE_Season11E.description: Discover the underground crypt and deploy the ghost vacuum to stop the true threat in the hotel - the door to darkness!

objectives.description: Deploy and defend the ghost vacuum

LTE_Frostnite.name: Cold Hard Cache
LTE_Frostnite.description: Restock our supplies by looting as many hidden chests or safes as you can! (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Loot 40 Chests (or safes) in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Mist of the North
LTE_Frostnite.description: Eliminate as many Mist Monsters as you can. (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Mist Monsters in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Lone Krampus
LTE_Frostnite.description: Clear out the Krampus dens around the map to make the world a safer place for non-Krampus! (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Eliminate 20 Lone Krampus in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Frostnite Explorer
LTE_Frostnite.description: Put on your parka and brave the deadly cold to explore the entire Frostnite map. (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Fully explore the Frostnite map

LTE_Frostnite.name: Cold Traps
LTE_Frostnite.description: Craft 50 traps of Rare or higher rarity (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Craft 50 Rare+ Traps in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Frost Knight
LTE_Frostnite.description: Finish all of the waves of Frostnite in the most difficult zone! (Non-challenge missions only)

objectives.description: Complete Wave 30 of Frostnite in a 128+ Power zone

LTE_Frostnite.name: Burner Fuel
LTE_Frostnite.description: Keep that burner topped off with BluGlo! (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Deposit 200 BluGlo into the Burner in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week One Master
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 1 Challenge 3 times (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 1 Frostnite Challenge 3 times (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week One Warrior
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 1 Challenge (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 1 Frostnite Challenge (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Two Master
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 2 Challenge 3 times (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 2 Frostnite Challenge 3 times (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Two Warrior
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 2 Challenge (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 2 Frostnite Challenge (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Three Master
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 5 waves in the Week 3 Challenge 3 times (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 5 waves in the Week 3 Frostnite Challenge 3 times (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Three Warrior
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 5 waves in the Week 3 Challenge (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 5 waves in the Week 3 Frostnite Challenge (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Four Master
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 4 Challenge 3 times (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 4 Frostnite Challenge 3 times (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Four Warrior
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 4 Challenge (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 4 Frostnite Challenge (any threat level)
