LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 5 Challenge 3 times (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 5 Frostnite Challenge 3 times (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Five Warrior
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 5 Challenge (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 5 Frostnite Challenge (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Six Master
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 6 Challenge 3 times (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 6 Frostnite Challenge 3 times (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Six Warrior
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 6 Challenge (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 6 Frostnite Challenge (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Seven Master
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 7 Challenge 3 times (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 7 Frostnite Challenge 3 times (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Seven Warrior
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 7 Challenge (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in the Week 7 Frostnite Challenge (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Eight Master
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 6 waves in the Week 8 Challenge 3 times (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 6 waves in the Week 8 Frostnite Challenge 3 times (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Week Eight Warrior
LTE_Frostnite.description: Survive for 6 waves in the Week 8 Challenge (any threat level). Weekly Challenges can be accessed by selecting the Map tab, and then selecting the Frostnite pin.

objectives.description: Survive for 6 waves in the Week 8 Frostnite Challenge (any threat level)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Polar Survival
LTE_Frostnite.description: Do whatever it takes to survive for forty-five minutes in Frostnite. (Non-challenge missions only)

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Winter Survival
LTE_Frostnite.description: Do whatever it takes to survive for thirty minutes in Frostnite. (Non-challenge missions only)

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Reaching for Greatness
LTE_Frostnite.description: You only get so many shots, so go. Each time, higher and higher as you chase that status. This is but a stepping stone.

objectives.description: Complete Wave 15 in Final Frost

LTE_Frostnite.name: The First Step
LTE_Frostnite.description: They say a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Thats how Legends are forged. This is your first step. Last for 30 minutes.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Final Frost

LTE_Frostnite.name: A Tale to Tell
LTE_Frostnite.description: Folk tales and heroes are hardly the stuff of Legend. But they have the potential to be. Write me a tale to tell, if you can. 45 minutes is all it takes, now go.

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Final Frost

LTE_Frostnite.name: A Crunch of Snow
LTE_Frostnite.description: Just listen to the quiet fall of snow; crunchy, isn't it? Makes you wanna go out and frolic among the husks, taking a swing at them every now and then, spring a few traps, you know, the usual! See you in 30?

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Frosty Turf

LTE_Frostnite.name: Trapper's Delight
LTE_Frostnite.description: Yeah the traps are freezing, and yeah the night is cold. But dont let that stop you! Survive at least 45 minutes out there and Ill make it worth your while!

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Frosty Turf

LTE_Frostnite.name: Frosty the Trapper
LTE_Frostnite.description: Whats that? The traps are freezing up? Its only -60C outside! Theyll work fine, and Ill prove it to you! Go eliminate 100 Husks with those traps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 100 husks with traps in Frosty Turf

LTE_Frostnite.name: Ice Picker
LTE_Frostnite.description: Dont be picky! Well, actually, yes. Be picky, pick that ice! Get the BluGlo out of those Ice Blocks so we can use them!

objectives.description: Break out BluGlo from Ice Blocks in Frostnite 3 times in a single mission (Note: This is a repeatable quest)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Winter Pathfinder
LTE_Frostnite.description: Its cold, dark, and we have no knowledge of whats around us. We need a survey of the area so we have a better shot at success.

objectives.description: Explore the entire map in a single mission of Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: A Taste of the Cold
LTE_Frostnite.description: Its mighty cold outside! It might not be for everyone, but go ahead and spend some time to get used to things. You dont have to shoot for the moon or anything, just try it out. Its ok if you fail, you just gotta get back up and try again!

objectives.description: Survive a total of 30 waves in Frostnite (Note: This is a repeatable quest)

LTE_Frostnite.name: Burner Fuel
LTE_Frostnite.description: Keep that burner topped off with BluGlo! (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Deposit 200 BluGlo into the Burner in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Furnace Aflame
LTE_Frostnite.description: The furnace is whats keeping the storm at bay and baking my cookies! Make sure you keep it lit, otherwise were all in trouble!

objectives.description: Keep the BluGlo Furnace above 50% for more than 10 Waves

LTE_Frostnite.name: Cold Hard Cache
LTE_Frostnite.description: Restock our supplies by looting as many hidden chests or safes as you can! (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Loot 40 Chests (or safes) in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Mist of the North
LTE_Frostnite.description: Eliminate as many Mist Monsters as you can. (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Mist Monsters in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Survival Basics
LTE_Frostnite.description: The night is upon us! Do whatever it takes to survive 15 minutes in Frostnite!

objectives.description: Survive for 15 minutes in a single Frostnite Mission

LTE_Frostnite.name: Winter Survival
LTE_Frostnite.description: The night is upon us! Do whatever it takes to survive 30 minutes in Frostnite!

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single Frostnite Mission

LTE_Frostnite.name: Polar Survival
LTE_Frostnite.description: The night is upon us! Do whatever it takes to survive 45 minutes in Frostnite!

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single Frostnite Mission

LTE_Frostnite.name: Cold Traps
LTE_Frostnite.description: Craft 50 traps of Rare or higher rarity (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Craft 50 Rare (or higher) Traps in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite.name: Merry Mangler
LTE_Frostnite.description: Got your melee weapon? Good, youre gonna need it. The husks are everywhere, and the cold has jammed all the guns. Itll be tough, but I know you can make it at least 30 minutes out there!

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Merry Melee

LTE_Frostnite.name: Merry Mauler
LTE_Frostnite.description: You made it to 30 minutes? Great! The temperature keeps dropping, so were still a no-go on the guns front. Think you can make it to 45 minutes?

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Merry Melee

LTE_Frostnite.name: Merry Forger
LTE_Frostnite.description: The greatest of weapons are forged in the fires of battle, for it is those that aid you the most! Do yourself a favor, and get one! I guarantee itll extend your survivability out there!

objectives.description: Craft an epic or better melee weapon in Merry Melee

LTE_Frostnite.name: Wave Crasher
LTE_Frostnite.description: Riding the waves takes practice. You gotta start small, kiddo! Youre gonna crash into them a lot at the start, and thats ok! Start small, and try surviving for 8 waves out there, ok?

objectives.description: Survive for 8 waves in a single mission of New Wave Holiday

LTE_Frostnite.name: Wave Diver
LTE_Frostnite.description: Congrats on making it past 8 waves kiddo! Its time to dive in deep. Can you make it past 12 waves this time?

objectives.description: Survive for 12 waves in a single mission of New Wave Holiday

LTE_Frostnite.name: Making Waves
LTE_Frostnite.description: Welcome to the New Wave Holiday kiddo! Theres tons of husks out there to use as target practice, take out at least 50 of them with each kind of weapon you have! Go out there and make waves, kid!

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Melee Weapons in the New Wave Holiday
Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Shotgun Weapons in the New Wave Holiday
Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Assault Rifle Weapons in the New Wave Holiday
Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Pistol Weapons in the New Wave Holiday
Eliminate 50 Target Husks with Sniper Rifle Weapons in the New Wave Holiday

LTE_Frostnite.name: Gopher
LTE_Frostnite.description: Gopher! Deliver the BluGlo! Chop Chop! Those dispensers have to make it at least past 30 minutes or my - I mean, Our - supply will dip! Get going!

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Special Delivery

LTE_Frostnite.name: Mailman
LTE_Frostnite.description: Mail Call! Mail Call! I need this BluGlo delivered to your burner! Stay out there for at least 45 minutes while I redraw supply routes and other jargon-y stuff!

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Special Delivery

LTE_Frostnite.name: Keep your hands off my BluGlo!
LTE_Frostnite.description: Theyre after My- ah- Our BluGlo! Dont let them take it! If they break the dispensers Ill never have control over the BluGlo! They who control the BluGlo controls the Universe!

objectives.description: Complete Wave 11 with all BluGlo dispensers intact.

LTE_Frostnite.name: Dimming Embers
LTE_Frostnite.description: The colds almost oppressive. Makin the embers dim. Tell ya what, Im gonna put it on full blast. You should be able to make at least 30 minutes with the heat on your back.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Superheated

LTE_Frostnite.name: Warming Your Hands
LTE_Frostnite.description: I got the furnace a-blazin. That oughtta keep out the cold. But them darn Husks want the heat too, I bet. They just keep coming. Think you can run on for 45 minutes this time?

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Superheated

LTE_Frostnite.name: Toasty Halls and Warmer Walls
LTE_Frostnite.description: Cold, innit? So stick close to the furnace and get warm. If you build some walls and a roof; it keeps the heat in. Why dont you do just that? Staying warm sounds mighty nice.

objectives.description: Place 100 Structures in Superheated

LTE_Frostnite.name: Taste the Stew
LTE_Frostnite.description: You gotta get a taste of it. Stay out there for 30 minutes, and youll get something packed with flavor.

objectives.description: Survive for 30 minutes in a single mission of Top it Off

LTE_Frostnite.name: Grab a Serving
LTE_Frostnite.description: Tasty, wasnt it? Theres always more. Grab a serving, and go share it with some Husks, eh? If you can let it cook for 45 minutes, I can guarantee you a good meal.

objectives.description: Survive for 45 minutes in a single mission of Top it Off

LTE_Frostnite.name: Perpetual Stew
LTE_Frostnite.description: You ever had perpetual stew? The flavor always changes, but technically its the same stew, and it never stops cooking. You cant let it empty out, and you gotta add something new every now and then. Try it with your Furnace, I bet the results will be tasty.

objectives.description: Deposit at least one BluGlo every wave for 10 waves in a single mission of Top it Off

LTE_Frostnite.name: Survival Basics
LTE_Frostnite.description: Do whatever it takes to survive for fifteen minutes in Frostnite. (Non-challenge missions only)

objectives.description: Survive for 15 minutes in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: The Legends of the Frost
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: The longest and darkest night is here. It is the Final Frost. But remember as they say; It is darkest before the dawn. Survive the Final Frost, so we may raise our mugs to you, once you become Legends.

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 in Final Frost

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: Breaking the Permafrost
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: Ok, so the traps are freezing up, its cold outside, and the enemy have us surrounded. Perfect! They have nowhere to run to now!

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 in Frosty Turf

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: Master of the Krampus Hunt
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: Theyre out there! The Krampuses! - Or is it Krampi? - And not just tonight! Theyre all the way into next week! Or last week! Maybe even now! I cant take it! They gotta be dealt with! To the last hair!

objectives.description: Complete Krampus Krazies
Eliminate 100 Lone Krampus enemies

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: United We Stay Warm
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: In the season of giving, its time to give with friends. Make it through the whole Frostnite in a group of one of each class. This will take the best laid plans with the closest of coordination.

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 of Frostnite in a group with one of each class.

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: Frost Knight
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: Finish all of the waves of Frostnite in the most difficult zone! (Non-challenge missions only)

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 of Frostnite in a 128+ Power zone

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: Merry Madness
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: How do you feel about dancing? Dancing among a horde of husks with a trusty melee weapon! Make it through the night and theres a nice prize waiting for you at the end!

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 in Merry Melee

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: Wave Rider
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: Think youre ready to ride the waves? Its a long night, but I believe in you, kiddo! See you on the farside when you make it through the night!

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 in New Wave Holiday

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: Through Sleet and Snow
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: This supply line cant be broken! You gotta make those BluGlo deliveries throughout the night. Ill make it worth your while! Just dont let them take my- I mean- our BluGlo!

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 in Special Delivery

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: Furnace Fires
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: Ever hear A Ring Of Fire? Cuz we got one o those now. If you can keep er blazin through the night, well be set for a good ol while.

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 in Superheated

LTE_Frostnite_Elite.name: The Pot is Half Full
LTE_Frostnite_Elite.description: A long night, and an even longer line. Look at all those husks out there. Do you like Gumbo? Maybe some Tomato Bisque? Those dont take long to cook, not like what Im cooking up now. Survive all night and you might get a treat.

objectives.description: Complete Wave 20 in Top it Off

LTE_Frostnite_Daily.name: BluGlo Burner
LTE_Frostnite_Daily.description: When its this cold, its hard to stay warm! Make sure youre doing your part to put BluGlo into the Furnace!

objectives.description: Deposit 15 BluGlo into the Furnace in a single Frostnite mission

LTE_Frostnite_Daily.name: SnoFort Architect
LTE_Frostnite_Daily.description: So you think you got what it takes to build a Frostnite Fort? Not only does it take planning, but speed and precision! Youre under pressure out there, show me you can do it! Place those structures!

objectives.description: Place 100 Structures in Frostnite

LTE_Frostnite_Daily.name: Krampus Krazies
LTE_Frostnite_Daily.description: Look at all these Krampi! - Or are they Krampuses? Maybe Krampen? - Theyre a threat to everything we stand for! Make sure theyre all cleared out!

objectives.description: Eliminate all Lone Krampus targets in a single Frostnite Mission

LTE_Frostnite_Daily.name: Icebreaker
LTE_Frostnite_Daily.description: Come now! Dont be shy! Lets 'Break the Ice' and get to know each other better while were together, eh? Break the BluGlo out of those ice blocks so we can keep this fire warm.

objectives.description: Break out BluGlo from Ice Blocks in Frostnite 7 times.

LTE_Frostnite_Daily.name: Frosty Builder
LTE_Frostnite_Daily.description: Brrr! Its cold! But that shouldnt hold you back! Youre frosty for sure! How long can you last out there as a Constructor?

objectives.description: Survive for 30 Minutes in a single mission of Frostnite as a Constructor

LTE_Frostnite_Daily.name: Frosty Shinobi
LTE_Frostnite_Daily.description: Brrr! Its cold! But that shouldnt hold you back! Youre frosty for sure! How long can you last out there as a Ninja?

objectives.description: Survive for 30 Minutes in a single mission of Frostnite as a Ninja

LTE_Frostnite_Daily.name: Frosty Looter
LTE_Frostnite_Daily.description: Brrr! Its cold! But that shouldnt hold you back! Youre frosty for sure! How long can you last out there as an Outlander?

objectives.description: Survive for 30 Minutes in a single mission of Frostnite as an Outlander

LTE_Frostnite_Daily.name: Frosty Warrior
LTE_Frostnite_Daily.description: Brrr! Its cold! But that shouldnt hold you back! Youre frosty for sure! How long can you last out there as a Soldier?

objectives.description: Survive for 30 Minutes in a single mission of Frostnite as a Soldier

LTE_HuntMonster.name: Track Tracking
LTE_HuntMonster.description: A Mist Titan has been spotted out in the world. Investigate its tracks to get a better idea of what were up against.

objectives.description: Investigate the Mist Titans tracks

LTE_HuntMonster.name: Cracking Crystals
LTE_HuntMonster.description: Destroy the crystal weak points on the new Mist Titans.

objectives.description: Destroy crystal weak points.

LTE_HuntMonster.name: Hunter Hextraordinaire
LTE_HuntMonster.description: Prove your hunting expertise by completing the new Hunt the Titan mission.

objectives.description: Complete the new Hunt the Titan mission

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Epic Mixtape
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Find Cassette tapes scattered randomly in various searchable objects in the Hit the Road maps. Requires successful mission completion.

objectives.description: Find 25 Cassette Tapes in various containers in Hit the Road missions. This quest is repeatable.

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Loot Chests
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Restock your supplies by looting as many hidden chests or safes as you can in successful "Hit the Road" missions.

objectives.description: Loot 40 Chests (or safes) in "Hit the Road"

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Eliminate Mist Monsters
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Eliminate as many Mist Monsters as you can in successful "Hit the Road" missions.

objectives.description: Eliminate 40 Mist Monsters in "Hit the Road"

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Impossibly Spotless Finish
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Complete the "Hit the Road" mission without the truck taking damage in the most difficult zone available!

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" without the truck taking damage in a 50+ zone.

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Spotless Finish
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Complete the "Hit the Road" mission without the truck taking damage.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" without the truck taking damage

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Ultimate Guide
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Complete all of the randomized secondary objectives in successful "Hit the Road" missions. Complete "Bridge Out!", "Infestation", "Minor Delay", "Feelin' Blu", "Pit Stop", "Overheat", "Signal Boost", and "Record Dash"

objectives.description: Complete "Bridge Out!"
Complete "Infestation"
Complete "Minor Delay"
Complete "Feelin' Blu"
Complete "Pit Stop"
Complete "Overheat"
Complete "Signal Boost"
Complete "Record Dash"

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Limited Edition!
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Find an edition of the Extended Solo Monthly Magazine in a successful "Hit the Road" mission three times.

objectives.description: Find 3 Extended Solo Monthly Magazines in "Hit the Road"

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Well-Traveled
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Escort the Truck a total distance of 2500m traveled in "Hit the Road".

objectives.description: Escort the truck in "Hit the Road" a total distance of 2500m.

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Hit the Road (Daily)
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Successfully complete a "Hit the Road" mission. Note: This is a Daily Quest.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road"

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Beat Bot
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Beat Bot to the radio station three times in successful "Hit the Road" missions.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Beat Bot, three times.

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Cloaked Star
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Cloaked Star to the radio station in a successful "Hit the Road" mission.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Cloaked Star

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Cloaked Star pt 2
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Cloaked Star to the radio station in a successful "Hit the Road" mission.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Cloaked Star

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Crackshot pt 2
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Crackshot to the radio station in a successful "Hit the Road" mission.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Crackshot

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Penny
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Penny to the radio station in a successful "Hit the Road" mission.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Penny

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Penny pt 2
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Penny to the radio station in a successful "Hit the Road" mission.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Penny

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Quinn pt 2
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Quinn to the radio station in a successful "Hit the Road" mission.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Quinn

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Quinn pt 3
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Quinn to the radio station in a successful "Hit the Road" mission.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Quinn

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Quinn
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Quinn to the radio station in a successful "Hit the Road" mission.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Quinn

LTR_Mayday2019.name: Escort Crackshot
LTR_Mayday2019.description: Get Crackshot to the radio station in a successful "Hit the Road" mission.

objectives.description: Complete "Hit the Road" while escorting Crackshot

LTE_MutantStorms.description: Commander, watch out! These husks are mutated by the storm. Eliminate as many of them as you can!

LTE_MutantStorms.description: Commander, watch out! These husks are mutated by the storm. Eliminate as many of them as you can!

LTE_MutantStorms.name: Enraged - Stage 2
LTE_MutantStorms.description: Commander, watch out! These husks are mutated by the storm. Eliminate as many of them as you can!
