LTE_MutantStorms.description: Commander, watch out! These husks are mutated by the storm. Eliminate as many of them as you can!

objectives.description: Eliminate 500 Enraged Husks in Mutant Storm missions

LTE_MutantStorms.name: We've Got Traps
LTE_MutantStorms.description: Commander, if you're going to survive, you need to fight these husks with traps! Team up with other Commanders, and place as many traps as you can to rid the world of these terrible Husks!

objectives.description: Eliminate 1000 Husks with Traps

LTE_MutantStorms.name: Return of the "Mini-Boss"
LTE_MutantStorms.description: Eliminate as many Epic Mini-Bosses as you can, Commander! Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate an Epic Mini-Boss in a Mini-Boss mission

LTE_MutantStorms.name: Form of... Llama!
LTE_MutantStorms.description: Survive the Mutant Storms and earn your very own Storm Llama. Earn Storm Tickets by successfully completing missions in Mutant Storm missions.

objectives.description: Purchase a Storm Llama from the Loot tab

LTE_MutantStorms.name: Storm's Getting Rowdy!
LTE_MutantStorms.description: Storms are rapidly spreading. Look at all that purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mutant Storm missions in a 26+ zone

LTE_MutantStorms.name: Stormclouds Incoming
LTE_MutantStorms.description: Storms are rapidly spreading. Look at all that purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mutant Storm missions in a 16+ zone

LTE_MutantStorms.name: Important Weather Alert
LTE_MutantStorms.description: Storms are rapidly spreading. Look at all that purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes.

objectives.description: Complete 10 Mutant Storm missions

LTE_MutantStorms.name: Terrors in the Mists
LTE_MutantStorms.description: Lets see what those hydraulic weapons can do against the mist monsters!

objectives.description: Eliminate 150 Mist Monsters with a Hydraulic Weapon

LTE_Outlandish.name: Vending Up Problems
LTE_Outlandish.description: Search vending machines for genuine Slurp products and get Mayhem on board.

objectives.description: Interact with vending machines in search of genuine Slurp.

LTE_Outlandish.name: Strange Poddities
LTE_Outlandish.description: Join the hit team in investigating the strange Pods that have begun to spread from the Storm's weirdness.

objectives.description: Investigate Husk Pods in any hex.

LTE_Outlandish.name: Slap-a-the-keg
LTE_Outlandish.description: Help the team investigate, analyze, and destroy the bootleg Slurp.

objectives.description: Destroy Slurp Kegs found throughout the world

LTE_Outlandish.name: Rally and Recoup
LTE_Outlandish.description: Help our new outlandish friends recoup our resources by completing a Resupply mission!

objectives.description: Complete a Resupply mission.

LTE_Outlandish.name: In-Vending Doom
LTE_Outlandish.description: Defeat the corrupted vending machine to get the world back to normal.

objectives.description: Defeat the corrupted vending machine.

LTE_Outlandish.name: Survivorship Bias
LTE_Outlandish.description: Help the Outlanders rescue survivors and gain the survivors trust.

objectives.description: Rescue and interview survivors.

LTE_Outlandish.name: BluGlo Get It
LTE_Outlandish.description: Help the Outlanders stock up on BluGlo and work together to face the rising storm.

objectives.description: Gather and stock up on BluGlo in any hex

LTE_Outlandish.name: Aberrant Bears
LTE_Outlandish.description: Somethings up with the TEDDIES. Destroy the malfunctioning bears, but be careful as they have a tendency to explode if you get too close.

objectives.description: Destroy TEDDIES in a City, Suburban, or Industrial zone

LTE_Outlandish.name: Slap-a-the-keg
LTE_Outlandish.description: Help the team investigate, analyze, and destroy the bootleg Slurp.

objectives.description: Destroy Slurp Kegs found in any hex

LTE_Raptor.name: Dont Bite the Hand that Tames
LTE_Raptor.description: Show that you are the ultimate raptor wrangler by taming two raptors.

objectives.description: Tame 2 raptors

LTE_Raptor.name: Raptor Rodeo
LTE_Raptor.description: Prove youre a real raptor riding pro by traveling 1000m on raptor-back.

objectives.description: Travel 1000m while riding a raptor

LTE_Raptor.name: Ricochet Ranger
LTE_Raptor.description: Eliminate 50 husks while riding any wildlife to prove your mounted combat skills!

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 husks while riding wildlife

LTE_Season9A.name: The Major, the Lok, and the Wardrobes
LTE_Season9A.description: Help Lok overcome his fears by destroying potential monster hiding places.

objectives.description: Destroy closets that may harbor monsters in Suburban and Urban zones

LTE_Season9A.name: Lok Out
LTE_Season9A.description: Lok has gone missing. Use his flier cannons to distribute missing posters.

objectives.description: Activate the flier cannons

LTE_Season9A.name: TV Party
LTE_Season9A.description: Help Jess take the easy way out.

objectives.description: Collect televisions for Lok in Suburban and Urban zones

LTE_Season9A.name: Monster Hunters
LTE_Season9A.description: We've found the area from Lok's broadcast. The monster should be nearby.

objectives.description: Search the zone for signs of Lok's monster

LTE_Season9A.name: Ding!
LTE_Season9A.description: Well... Lok was right. We'd better find a way to learn more about his monster encounter.

objectives.description: Search the zone for printer paper in Suburban, Urban, and Industrial zones

LTE_Season9A.name: Post Mortem
LTE_Season9A.description: Find out who's responsible for Lok's lock out by reviewing security footage.

objectives.description: Collect security footage in Suburban and Urban zones

LTE_Season9A.name: Is This Your Monster?
LTE_Season9A.description: Search the zone to find Lok's monster.

objectives.description: Search the zone for gargoyles

LTE_Season9A.name: Dennosaur
LTE_Season9A.description: Dennis has a plan, and it involves dinosaurs - You know what to do.

objectives.description: Collect dinosaur toys in Suburban, Urban, and Industrial zones

LTE_Season9A.name: Self Care
LTE_Season9A.description: Luna's in charge, and that means it's time to relax and play games. Collect arcade games to get the party started.

objectives.description: Collect arcade games in Suburban, Urban, and Industrial zones

LTE_Season9A.name: Crash Course
LTE_Season9A.description: Find books to pinpoint the location of Lok's television projection.

objectives.description: Destroy bookcases to collect books in Suburban and Urban zones

LTE_Season9A.name: To Be Continued
LTE_Season9A.description: Is this monster encounter a stand alone feature? A trilogy? A prequel? Dennis will decide...

objectives.description: Collect video editing software in Urban zones

LTE_Season9A.name: We'll Have the Quinoa
LTE_Season9A.description: Help Dennis prepare for open-bot surgery by collecting parts for a post surgery incubation oven.

objectives.description: Destroy ovens to collect heating elements in Suburban zones

LTE_Season9A.name: It Goes Where It Goes
LTE_Season9A.description: Help Dennis test out his latest invention.

objectives.description: Collect teddy bears in Suburban zones

LTE_Season9A.name: Din. Er
LTE_Season9A.description: The beast must feed! Help Din.0 feast on mist monster samples.

objectives.description: Gather mist monster samples

LTE_Season9A.name: Major Spoilers
LTE_Season9A.description: Husklings have raided the Homebase gold supply. Take 'em out and return the missing rings.

objectives.description: Take out husklings and collect golden rings

LTE_Season9B.name: And I am Her Cap'n
LTE_Season9B.description: Cap'n Azalea Clark has been spotted at Homebase. It's time to binge watch Beyond The Stellar Horizon.

objectives.description: Collect episodes of Beyond The Stellar Horizon

LTE_Season9B.name: Troll-bles
LTE_Season9B.description: Every film production has a troll problem or two. Deploy anti-troll vacuums and take back what's ours.

objectives.description: Deploy troll vacuums over dormant troll dens

LTE_Season9B.name: ADR
LTE_Season9B.description: ED-EE is in space and we have no time to recast. Deploy antennas to record his dialogue from orbit.

objectives.description: Deploy communication antennas

LTE_Season9B.name: The Produce-ers
LTE_Season9B.description: The movie is a disaster! Collect mushy tomatoes before they can be thrown in our faces!

objectives.description: Collect mushy tomatoes

LTE_Season9B.name: Red Carpet
LTE_Season9B.description: We may need to provide some escape routes from the premiere. Collect red carpets.

objectives.description: Gather red carpets

LTE_Season9B.name: Splash Down
LTE_Season9B.description: ED-EE is coming home. Deploy pillows to give him a safe landing.

objectives.description: Deploy emergency landing pillows

LTE_Season9B.name: Vision
LTE_Season9B.description: Pre-production is a go! Find cameras and prepare for filming.

objectives.description: Search the zone for cameras

LTE_Season9B.name: Bat to Business
LTE_Season9B.description: Lure Ken back into the acting game by tracking down his iconic catchphrase.

objectives.description: Search the zone for Ken's iconic catchphrase

LTE_Season9B.name: Park Bench Scene
LTE_Season9B.description: Script pages are coming in! Track down the best scenes you can find.

objectives.description: Collect script pages

LTE_Season9B.name: Cinma-Vrit
LTE_Season9B.description: Okay, the script is not great. We're gonna need some very special effects. Collect rocket parts.

objectives.description: Search the zone for rocket parts in Industrial zones

LTE_Season9B.name: ED-EE
LTE_Season9B.description: Help Azalea find everything she needs to rebuild ED-EE.

objectives.description: Collect ED-EE parts in Industrial zones

LTE_Season9B.name: Table Read
LTE_Season9B.description: Time to see what our writers have come up with. It's probably fine.

objectives.description: Gather table parts

LTE_Season9B.name: Headshots
LTE_Season9B.description: The casting office has been raided by husks. Get those headshots back!

objectives.description: Take out the husks and collect the missing headshots
Re-shoot key scenes with CG-Bot

LTE_Season9B.name: Backstage
LTE_Season9B.description: The Beyond the Stellar Horizon soundstage has been found. Explore the set!

objectives.description: Search the Beyond the Stellar Horizon soundstage

LTE_Season13A.name: Pirate Attack!
LTE_Season13A.description: Homebase is under attack by a mob of pirates! Complete the Yarrr's Return mission in Scurvy Shoals

objectives.description: Complete Yarrr's Return mission

LTE_Season13A.name: With Honors
LTE_Season13A.description: Riggs is confident that he is ready for action. Head out into the zone and rescue some survivors!

objectives.description: Rescue survivors in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Season13A.name: Don't Steal My Coconuts
LTE_Season13A.description: One of the most basic rules for survival is to find nourishment. Destroy palm trees to collect coconuts to eat.

objectives.description: Destroy palm trees and collect coconuts in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Season13A.name: Tales From the Loophole
LTE_Season13A.description: To prove he is hero material, Riggs must find a way to reorient himself when lost in the storm. Destroy runic boulders to find hidden maps and help him find his way.

objectives.description: Destroy runic boulders and collect treasure maps in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Season13A.name: King Hat
LTE_Season13A.description: The highest honor to bestow on a pirate is being crowned a Pirate King. Eliminate Husky Husks and find a suitable crown for Blakebeard.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husky Husks and Collect Crowns in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Season13A.name: Oh That's What It's Good For
LTE_Season13A.description: Now that Blakebeard is satisfied, Riggs is the one in crisis. To get some perspective, hunt lobbers and collect their telescopes to survey the land.

objectives.description: Eliminate Lobbers and Collect Telescopes in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Season13A.name: The Red Doubloons
LTE_Season13A.description: What is a legendary ghost pirate without a stash of plundered treasure? Find sacks of doubloons to add to Blakebeard's ill-gotten riches.

objectives.description: Collect Stashes of Treasure in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Season13A.name: I See Shanties
LTE_Season13A.description: Blakebeard's friends wrote sea shanties about the pirate's exploits. Find Boomboxes throughout the land so everyone can hear these catchy tunes.

objectives.description: Find Boomboxes in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Season13A.name: Sucker Punch
LTE_Season13A.description: Willow has placed poisoned punch throughout the world to swell Blakebeard's ranks with ghost pirates. Destroy the punch before her diabolical plan can succeed.

objectives.description: Destroy Barrels of Poisoned Punch in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Season13A.name: Ghost to Coast
LTE_Season13A.description: In attempt to show Blakebeard what it really is like in the afterlife, Willow trapped ghosts so they can provide the pirate with accounts of being dead. Find the ghost cages to hear their stories.

objectives.description: Collect Ghost Cages in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Season13A.name: Lights Out
LTE_Season13A.description: The now thoroughly dead pirate Blakebeard, wants to show the worlds of the living and the dead that he is a villain of the highest caliber. To usher in this new age of dread, destroy Lanterns and plunge the world into darkness!

objectives.description: Destroy Lanterns in Scurvy Shoals

LTE_Love.name: Oh!
LTE_Love.description: Kyle and Eagle Eye are in love... but they have nothing in common. Search for something, anything they can agree on.

objectives.description: Search for Stuff

LTE_Love.name: Maps
LTE_Love.description: The antidote to love lies in Hexsylvania... how do we get there again?

objectives.description: Search Hexsylvanian Travel Chests

LTE_Love.name: I Remember Me
LTE_Love.description: It's time to put an end to the love storm. Distribute Hate Potion to the love scrambled heroes of Homebase.

objectives.description: Distribute Hate Potions

LTE_Love.name: Love Wars
LTE_Love.description: Find out who is behind the terrible new advice call in show, Dennis The Love King.

objectives.description: Find Working Payphones in Urban and Suburban zones

LTE_Love.name: Satellite of Love
LTE_Love.description: The forecast calls for crushing infatuation! Help Lars track the love storm.

objectives.description: Deploy Sensors for Lars

LTE_Love.name: Happy Together
LTE_Love.description: Last year's teddy bear balloons are causing problems for the local wildlife, track 'em down and bring 'em home.

objectives.description: Collect Deflated Teddy Bear Balloons

LTE_Love.name: Little Star
LTE_Love.description: A love fog is settling over Homebase. Help Sarah look to the stars to find her love horoscope.

objectives.description: Deploy Telescopes

LTE_Love.name: I Think I Need a New Heart
LTE_Love.description: Ray just isn't feeling the love. Find some romantic comedies to set the mood for romance.

objectives.description: Find Romantic Comedies

LTE_Love.name: Trapped by Love
LTE_Love.description: Penny has a new plan for dealing with the husk horde. Collect container walls...

objectives.description: Collect Container Walls in Industrial zones

LTE_Love.name: Uh Oh, Love Comes to Town
LTE_Love.description: Everyone's in love - in a bad way. Search love letters for clues.

objectives.description: Collect Love Letters from Mailboxes

LTE_Love.name: Papers
LTE_Love.description: Sarah and Jonesy have returned from Hexslyvania with the Hate Potion recipe. Collect hate mushrooms and get ready to brew!

objectives.description: Collect Hate Mushrooms in Forest zones

LTE_Love.name: Pictures of You
LTE_Love.description: The Cloaked Star refuses the call of romance. Help him come to terms with the past in a newspaper box smashing trip down memory lane.

objectives.description: Collect Old Newspapers in Urban and Suburban zones

LTE_Love.name: The Book of Love
LTE_Love.description: Director Riggs needs a love policy stat! Search office spaces for any love related HR guidelines.

objectives.description: Collect Old HR Guidelines from Office File Cabinets and Cubicles in Urban, Suburban, Industrial zones

LTE_Love.name: All My Friends
LTE_Love.description: We found the cure, but the love lobbers are still lobbing. Take 'em out, collect their Love Poison, and tell 'em how you feel.

objectives.description: Collect Love Poison Bottles from Love Lobbers

LTE_Love.name: You Send Me
LTE_Love.description: Prepare to send an expedition to Hexsylvania, trebuchet style.

objectives.description: Prepare the Trebuchet

LTE_Love.name: If You Can't Find Love...
LTE_Love.description: There's always chocolate. Search the world for romantic chocolates. Most often found in home kitchens and grocery stores in urban and suburban zones.

objectives.description: Find Chocolates

LTE_Love.name: ... Has Its Thorn
LTE_Love.description: The time for romantic meddling is at hand! Help Dennis find roses for Summer.

objectives.description: Find 7 flowers

LTE_Love.name: Love's Letters Lost
LTE_Love.description: Search red mailboxes for notes from Summer.

objectives.description: Search 5 Mailboxes

LTE_Love.name: Dennis to Society
LTE_Love.description: Rescue Dennis from the storm, and himself.

objectives.description: Find & Defend: Dennis

LTE_Love.name: Keep Summer Safe
LTE_Love.description: Help Dennis rescue Summer.

objectives.description: Find & Defend Summer

LTE_Love.name: In Your Ears
LTE_Love.description: Help Dennis and Summer reunite with the perfect couple song.

objectives.description: Listen to 5 boomboxes

LTE_Love.name: Bear Force One
LTE_Love.description: The Teddy Bear Balloons are filled with chocolate and ready to launch! Spread the love (or at least the calories) to the survivors out in the world.

objectives.description: Launch Teddy Bear Balloons

LTE_Spring2018.name: Dial M For Eggs
LTE_Spring2018.description: Help Ray take on her most challenging case yet.

objectives.description: Find 9 Easter Eggs

LTE_Spring2018.name: The Dreaded Clusterhusk
LTE_Spring2018.description: A deadly cluster of dangerous husks is on the loose! Team up and take out all three.

objectives.description: Eliminate the dreaded clusterhusk!

LTE_Spring2018.name: Leaves of Four
LTE_Spring2018.description: Do the husks seem luckier than usual? Take 'em out and look for clues.

objectives.description: Eliminate & Collect: 50 lucky clovers

LTE_Spring2018.name: You Don't Have To Go Home...
LTE_Spring2018.description: Search for a pub to learn the Leprechaun's true name. Pubs are most often found in downtown city areas.

objectives.description: Visit one pub

LTE_Spring2018.name: Trojan Bunny
LTE_Spring2018.description: Whenever we celebrate, the storm attacks. It's time to turn the tables with some hoppin' adorable mayhem!

objectives.description: Build a Trojan Bunny

LTE_Spring2018.name: Stab n' Slash 101
LTE_Spring2018.description: Break out a melee weapon and show Val how it's done.

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 husks with a melee weapon

LTE_Spring2018.name: Creature Features
LTE_Spring2018.description: Rumors of the Dreaded Clusterhusk might just be true. Search for footage of the rampaging trio of deadly husks.

objectives.description: Access 6 CCTV cameras

LTE_Spring2018.name: Dressed To Kill
LTE_Spring2018.description: Collect tactical clothing for Val. Destroy clothing racks and closets found in urban and suburban zones.

objectives.description: Gather tactical clothing

LTE_Spring2018.name: My Name Is
LTE_Spring2018.description: To banish our storm leprechaun, well need to learn his name. Search for his signature on green painted gnomes.

objectives.description: Find 5 Green Garden Gnomes

LTE_Spring2018.name: Two More!
LTE_Spring2018.description: Collect gym equipment for Val. Found in urban and suburban zones.

objectives.description: Gather 5 pieces of training equipment

LTE_Spring2018.name: Nobody Takes Me Flakes!
LTE_Spring2018.description: To trap a leprechaun, you're going to need some tasty treats. Bait traps with leprechaun endorsed snacks.

objectives.description: Deploy 5 Leprechaun Traps

LTE_Spring2018.name: Fool's Gold
LTE_Spring2018.description: Commander, there's free gold EVERYWHERE! Oh, and on an unrelated note, we have reports there's a new storm hazard luring people into dangerous situations. So get out there and don't come back until we're rich!

objectives.description: Search the zone for Storm Gold

LTE_Spring2018.name: Let's Commence
LTE_Spring2018.description: Prepare a speech for Val's graduation.

objectives.description: Search 5 book stacks

LTE_Spring2018.name: The Blu Badge Of Courage
LTE_Spring2018.description: Find and defend a stranded survivor.

objectives.description: Find & Defend Val

LTE_Spring2018.name: Band on the Run
LTE_Spring2018.description: Help Val find the rest of her team.

objectives.description: Search 5 tents for Val's team

LTE_Spring2018.name: Inspirational Films
LTE_Spring2018.description: Find the perfect film to help Val power through her training.

objectives.description: Gather 8 VHS tapes

LTE_Spring2018.name: Double Trouble
LTE_Spring2018.description: When you locate the primary objective, look for a difficulty pylon nearby. Interact with the pylon and add BluGlo to increase the difficulty. You can increase the difficulty more than once, but it is not required.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Enhanced Difficulty Missions

LTE_Spring2018.name: The Big Wick
LTE_Spring2018.description: Protect and launch a Mega-Llamacracker to light up the night sky with style.

objectives.description: Launch 2 Firework Clusters Secondaries

LTE_Spring2018.name: Dragon Weapon Evolution
LTE_Spring2018.description: Visit the Armory tab to evolve a Dragon Weapon of your choice.

objectives.description: Evolve a Dragon Weapon by 1 Star

LTE_Spring2018.name: Bye Bye!
LTE_Spring2018.description: Put your Dragon Weapons to good use. Team up with other Commanders and rid the world of these creeps!

objectives.description: Eliminate 886 Husks with a Dragon Weapon

LTE_Spring2018.name: Mistfortune
LTE_Spring2018.description: Unleash the dragon and defeat 38 mist monsters with your favorite Dragon Weapon.

objectives.description: Eliminate 38 Mist Monsters with a Dragon Weapon

LTE_Spring2018.name: Change of Luck
LTE_Spring2018.description: We need all the luck we can get. The coins thrown into the fountains should have some residual luck in them. Smash the fountains and collect those lucky coins. Most often found in urban and suburban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy fountains to collect lucky coins.

LTE_Spring2018.name: 'Nitelites
LTE_Spring2018.description: Place red lanterns for fortune and luck.

objectives.description: Place 8 lanterns

LTE_Spring2018.name: Things That Go Bang In The Night
LTE_Spring2018.description: Stay lucky! Launch fireworks and collect those envelopes. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Deploy small fireworks and gather red envelopes

LTE_Spring2018.name: Luck Explosion
LTE_Spring2018.description: Stock up on luck by launching fireworks and collecting red envelopes.

objectives.description: Deploy small fireworks

LTE_Repeatable.name: A Watery Grave
LTE_Repeatable.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Water Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Water Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Water Husks

LTE_Repeatable.name: Forces of Nature
LTE_Repeatable.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Nature Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Nature Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Nature Husks

LTE_Repeatable.name: Set the World on Fire
LTE_Repeatable.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Fire Husks as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest. Fire Husks can be found in Plankerton or higher areas.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Fire Husks

LTE_Repeatable.name: Danger in the Mist
LTE_Repeatable.description:
Now that you have access to a Perk Recombobulator, eliminate as many Mist Monsters as you can to earn PERK-UPs to power it. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

The Perk Recombobulator feature is available after completing the Plankerton Storm Shield Defense 2 Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Mist Monsters

LTE_Repeatable.name: Killer Storms
LTE_Repeatable.description: Storms are rapidly spreading. Look at all that purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Mutant Storm or Elemental Storm missions

LTE_Repeatable.name: Epic "Mini-Boss"
LTE_Repeatable.description: Eliminate as many Epic Mini-Bosses as you can, Commander! Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate an Epic Mini-Boss

LTE_Repeatable.name: Beta Storm Prospecting
LTE_Repeatable.description: We're seeing some strange weather patterns in the area. Complete some Beta Storm missions, for Science (and Gold)!

objectives.description: Complete 2 Beta Storm missions

LTE_Repeatable.name: Beta Storm Alert!
LTE_Repeatable.description: We're seeing some strange weather patterns in the area. Complete some Beta Storm missions, for Science (and Gold)! Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Beta Storm missions

LTE_Pirate.name: Under the Black Flag
LTE_Pirate.description: Teach our pirate recruits the secrets of piratical intimidation by planting pirate flags.

objectives.description: Deploy Pirate Flags in any zone

LTE_Pirate.name: Bottled Memoranda
LTE_Pirate.description: Check in on Blakebeard and Keelhaul's adventures on the high seas by collecting bottled messages.

objectives.description: Collect Messages from bottles

LTE_Pirate.name: Light the Way
LTE_Pirate.description: Light stone beacons to continue the search for Rowdy Jack's treasure.

objectives.description: Light the Stone Beacons

LTE_Pirate.name: Another Man's Treasure
LTE_Pirate.description: Dig up everything Blakebeard and Keelhaul have stolen from Homebase.

objectives.description: Find Caches in any zone

LTE_Pirate.name: SEE-Wolf
LTE_Pirate.description: A black flag flies on the horizon, are pirates headed for Homebase? Stand by to deploy our state of the art pirate detection system.

objectives.description: Deploy PIRA-SEE-Bots in any zone

LTE_Pirate.name: You Shant
LTE_Pirate.description: Help Blakebeard and Keelhaul rekindle their sea spirit by finding the perfect shanty.

objectives.description: Search for Sea Shanties

LTE_Pirate.name: Stone Faced
LTE_Pirate.description: The treasure hunt is on! Search ancient Plankenesian stone heads for clues.

objectives.description: Search Ancient Plankenesian Stone Heads for clues

LTE_Pirate.name: No One Leaves!
LTE_Pirate.description: This is it! Search the zone to find Rowdy Jack's treasure.

objectives.description: Find the Treasure. You might find it in any zone

LTE_Pirate.name: One Step
LTE_Pirate.description: Blakebeard and Keelhaul may not need peg legs yet, but it never hurts to be prepared. Destroy wooden chairs to harvest peg legs.

objectives.description: Collect Peg Legs from most wooden chairs.

LTE_Pirate.name: A Celebration of the Sea
LTE_Pirate.description: Fate has called upon Dennis to craft the ultimate Pirate Burger, but is he ready for the challenge?

objectives.description: Collect Grill Parts for Dennis. Found mostly in Suburban and Lakeside zones.

LTE_Pirate.name: Climb Aboard!
LTE_Pirate.description: Help Director Riggs build a sea sickness cure for Blakebeard and Keelhaul. HINT: Springs and Swing Parts can be found in Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Gather springs and swing parts to construct a sea-sickness simulator.

LTE_Pirate.name: Abordage
LTE_Pirate.description: Grab a melee weapon and prepare to demonstrate your swashbuckling, husk busting skills.

objectives.description: Collect Melee Trophies from husks

LTE_Pirate.name: Ship Wrecked
LTE_Pirate.description: Don't let the mist monsters make off with Blakebeard and Keelhaul's pirate ship!

objectives.description: Find Ship Parts by eliminating mist monsters in any zone.

LTE_Pirate.name: Yarrr!
LTE_Pirate.description: The pirates have crashed! Let's disarm their ship before they have a chance to attack.

objectives.description: Neutralize the Pirate Threat

LTE_Pirate.name: Walk the Plank
LTE_Pirate.description: Our pirates are ready to take to the seas once more. Help Blakebeard and Keelhaul build the pirate ship of their dreams.

objectives.description: Build the Pirate Ship

LTE_Season12A.name: Leap of Faith
LTE_Season12A.description: Love is back! The love lobbers are also out in force. Eliminate as many as you can to prevent heartbreak.

objectives.description: Eliminate love lobbers

LTE_Season12A.name: I'm Only Dancing
LTE_Season12A.description: Ray wants to convince Homebase that love is worth the risk. The best way to accomplish this is to dance! Hint: Use a dance emote at the marked locations in the area.

objectives.description: Dance at marked dance locations

LTE_Season12A.name: Forbidden Love
LTE_Season12A.description: Major Oswald isn't giving up on his mission. Help spread anti-love propaganda by deploying flyer cannons.

objectives.description: Deploy flyer cannons to spread anti-love propaganda

LTE_Season12A.name: Songs of Hate and Hate
LTE_Season12A.description: Lars is ready to debut his newest song inspired by the tragic break ups found in the discarded boxes. Deploy speakers in the area to blast the somber tune.

objectives.description: Deploy speakers to play Lars' new song

LTE_Season12A.name: Loveless
LTE_Season12A.description: Farrah has commissioned Lars to write a song which captures the anti-love spirit. Help by finding boxes of break-up materials to inspire the musician.

objectives.description: Find boxes of anti-love memorabilia

LTE_Season12A.name: Disco Demolition
LTE_Season12A.description: Ray has convinced Farrah to not destroy Homebase's capacity for love, instead they are going to destroy dance floors.

objectives.description: Place devices to destroy dance floors

LTE_Season12A.name: You're No Good
LTE_Season12A.description: Major Oswald has enlisted the help of Farrah to stop the spread of love. Her first suggestion is to deliver disheartening letters to the team of Homebase. Hint: Best found in Urban and Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy mailboxes to collect envelopes

LTE_Season12B.name: Your Own Boss
LTE_Season12B.description: Knox wants to try this "Constructor" thing. Help him by building a radar tower.

objectives.description: Build a radar tower for Knox.

LTE_Season12B.name: The Test
LTE_Season12B.description: THERAPYBOT has been asked to evaluate Knox, but the answer keys were stolen by husks. Eliminate Pitcher and Zapper husks and recover the answer booklets!

objectives.description: Eliminate Pitcher and Zapper husks to collect answer booklets

LTE_Season12B.name: It's Like A Dare
LTE_Season12B.description: Helping people, not hurting people. Now that the survivors are safe, help Knox gather supplies for them. Basic supplies. Very basic. HINT: Find stacks of toilet paper in bathrooms.

objectives.description: Search abandoned shelters and homes for toilet paper.

LTE_Season12B.name: Why We Fight
LTE_Season12B.description: Knox and Lars found survivors near the storm. Get out there and rescue them!

objectives.description: Rescue survivors found by Knox.

LTE_Season12B.name: Hero Training
LTE_Season12B.description: Show Knox what it takes to be a hero. Eliminate Mist Monsters or 'Sploders to show him how its done!

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters and 'Sploders!

LTE_Season12B.name: Right In The Zeus
LTE_Season12B.description: Knox needs parts from vehicles to fix Lars' van. Help by breaking down abandoned vehicles to find what's needed. HINT: Parts best found in City and Suburb zones.

objectives.description: Gather vehicle parts by destroying vehicles.

LTE_Season12B.name: Henchin'
LTE_Season12B.description: Many personnel files were lost during the latest husk attack. Help the Director find hard copies of the files by searching old filing cabinets and uncover Knox's past.

objectives.description: Search filing cabinets for personnel files on Knox.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Grotto Hard (Hidden)
LTE_Starlight.description: The Grotto Hard (Hidden)

objectives.description: The Grotto Hard (Hidden)

LTE_Starlight.name: The Labyrinth Hard (Hidden)
LTE_Starlight.description: The Labyrinth Hard (Hidden)

objectives.description: The Labyrinth Hard (Hidden)

LTE_Starlight.name: Daily Dungeon Destroyer
LTE_Starlight.description: The final test of your dedication to Dungeon destruction! Successfully complete 10 total Daily Dungeon quests to finally become a Daily Dungeon Destroyer!

objectives.description: Complete 10 Daily Dungeon quests.

LTE_Starlight.name: Daily Dungeon Pro
LTE_Starlight.description: Dungeon clearing is a major part of a balanced daily nutritional plan. Successfully complete 6 total Daily Dungeon quests and further your quest to become a Daily Dungeon Destroyer!

objectives.description: Complete 6 Daily Dungeon quests.

LTE_Starlight.name: Daily Dungeon Expert
LTE_Starlight.description: A dungeon a day keeps the Husks at bay... Successfully complete 3 Daily Dungeon quests and start your quest to become a Daily Dungeon Destroyer!

objectives.description: Complete 3 Daily Dungeon quests.

LTE_Starlight.name: Dungeon Trap Trial
LTE_Starlight.description: Looks like some evil force acting against you has set up traps that can be seen with spooky glyphs. Become affected by each one of these new traps, for science!

objectives.description: Get hit by an Arrow Dungeon Trap.
Get snared by a Snare Dungeon Trap.
Get hit by a Ceiling Drop Dungeon Trap.
Get teleported by a Teleport Dungeon Trap.

LTE_Starlight.name: Rift Reduction
LTE_Starlight.description: Storm Rifts are appearing in the Dungeons and Husks are popping out in swarms! Eliminate Husks to deplete the rifts in successful Dungeon missions.

objectives.description: Deplete 6 Dungeon Rifts in Dungeon missions.

LTE_Starlight.name: Destroy the Source
LTE_Starlight.description: Husks are emerging from odd crystalline objects in the Dungeons. Destroy many of these in successful Dungeon missions to stop the onslaught.

objectives.description: Destroy 6 Husk Monoliths in Dungeon missions.

LTE_Starlight.name: Dungeon Treasure?
LTE_Starlight.description: There is a ton of treasure to find in the Dungeons! But, it looks like not all of it is willing to go peacefully. Eliminate Mimics in successful Dungeon missions.

objectives.description: Eliminate 5 Mimics in successful Dungeon missions.

LTE_Starlight.name: Exorcism by Elimination
LTE_Starlight.description:
Eliminate powerful Mini-Bosses in successful Dungeon missions. Doctors say "exorcising" is important for your health!
Note: This is a repeatable quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate 5 Mini-Bosses in Dungeon missions.

LTE_Starlight.name: Urn Your Keep
LTE_Starlight.description:
Smash as many spooky urns as you can in successful missions in the Dungeons. Theres gotta be valuables hidden within them!
Note: This is a repeatable quest.

objectives.description: Destroy 100 urns in Dungeon missions.

LTE_Starlight.name: Dungeoneers: Constructor
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete any Dungeon as a Constructor.

objectives.description: As a Constructor, successfully clear a Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Dungeoneers: Ninja
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete any Dungeon as a Ninja.

objectives.description: As a Ninja, successfully clear a Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Dungeoneers: Outlander
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete any Dungeon as an Outlander.

objectives.description: As an Outlander, successfully clear a Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Dungeoneers: Soldier
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete any Dungeon as a Soldier.

objectives.description: As a Soldier, successfully clear a Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Lab Expert
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete the Lab at the most challenging level.

objectives.description: Complete the Lab Dungeon in a 50+ zone.

LTE_Starlight.name: Dungeon Champion
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete the following Dungeons at the most challenging level: The Crypts, Inferno, The Grotto, and The Labyrinth.

objectives.description: Complete the Crypts Dungeon in a 50+ zone.
Complete the Inferno Dungeon in a 50+ zone.
Complete the Grotto Dungeon in a 50+ zone.
Complete the Labyrinth Dungeon in a 50+ zone.

LTE_Starlight.name: Dungeoneer
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete the following Dungeons: The Crypts, Inferno, The Grotto, and The Labyrinth.

objectives.description: Complete the Crypts Dungeon.
Complete the Inferno Dungeon.
Complete the Grotto Dungeon.
Complete the Labyrinth Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Lab
LTE_Starlight.description: The Lab has been discovered! Enter if you dare! Complete a mission in the Lab Dungeon!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Lab Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Lab pt 2
LTE_Starlight.description: The Lab is a perilous place, but you're not afraid! Complete two more missions in the Lab Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete two missions in the Lab Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Lab pt 3
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete one final mission in the Lab Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Lab Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Labyrinth
LTE_Starlight.description: Dont lose yourself in the grand halls of The Labyrinth. Complete a mission in the Labyrinth Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Labyrinth Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Labyrinth pt 2
LTE_Starlight.description: This Labyrinth seems to be changing every time we enter it And, are we going in circles? Complete two more missions in the Labyrinth Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete two missions in the Labyrinth Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Labyrinth pt 3
LTE_Starlight.description: Master The Labyrinth! Complete one final mission in the Labyrinth Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Labyrinth Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Labyrinth: Timed Run!
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete The Labyrinth within the allotted time or face certain doom! Completing this challenge will unlock a special Melee Only Timed Run challenge for The Crypts.

objectives.description: Complete the Timed Run challenge in The Labyrinth.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Grotto
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete a mission in the Grotto Dungeon to gain access to The Labyrinth.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Grotto Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Grotto pt 2
LTE_Starlight.description: Take a dip in The Grotto to clear out more husks! Complete two more missions in the Grotto Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete two missions in the Grotto Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Grotto pt 3
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete one final mission in the Grotto Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Grotto Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Grotto: Timed Run!
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete The Grotto within the allotted time or face certain doom! Completing this challenge will unlock a Timed Run challenge for The Labyrinth.

objectives.description: Complete the Timed Run challenge in The Grotto.

LTE_Starlight.name: Inferno
LTE_Starlight.description: Inferno is a dungeon full of lava, fiery husks, and... fun! Complete a mission in the Inferno Dungeon to gain access to the Grotto!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Inferno Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Inferno's Revenge
LTE_Starlight.description: The deeper you go into the Inferno Dungeon, the hotter it gets. Complete two missions in the Inferno Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete two missions in the Inferno Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Inferno's Last Stand
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete one final mission in the Inferno Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Inferno Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Inferno: Timed Run!
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete Inferno within the allotted time or face certain doom! Completing this challenge will unlock a Timed Run challenge for The Grotto.

objectives.description: Complete the Timed Run challenge in Inferno.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Crypts
LTE_Starlight.description: The Crypts beckon you to enter and defeat its master! Complete a mission in the Crypts Dungeon to gain access to The Inferno and The Lab!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Crypts Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Crypts pt 2
LTE_Starlight.description: The Crypts are certainly a spooky place, but not too spooky for you! Complete two more missions in the Crypts Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete two missions in the Crypts Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Crypts pt 3
LTE_Starlight.description: Put all of your fears to an eternal rest and conquer The Crypts for good. Complete one final mission in the Crypts Dungeon.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Crypts Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Crypts: Melee Only!
LTE_Starlight.description: A special Melee Only challenge is available in The Crypts! Complete this challenge to unlock a new Timed Run challenge.

objectives.description: Complete the Melee Only challenge in The Crypts.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Crypts: Melee and Timed!
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete the Melee Only Timed Run challenge for The Crypts!

objectives.description: Complete the Melee Only, Timed Run challenge in The Crypts.

LTE_Starlight.name: The Crypts: Timed Run!
LTE_Starlight.description: Complete The Crypts within the allotted time or face certain doom! Completing this challenge will unlock a Timed Run challenge for Inferno.

objectives.description: Complete the Timed Run challenge in The Crypts.

LTE_Starlight.name: Keeper of Crypts (Daily)
LTE_Starlight.description:
Pay your respects to an old friend and successfully complete a mission in the Crypts Dungeon.
Note: This is a daily quest.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Crypts Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Inferno Excursion (Daily)
LTE_Starlight.description:
Complete a mission in the Inferno Dungeon.
Note: This is a daily quest.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Inferno Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Gotta Grotto (Daily)
LTE_Starlight.description:
Complete a mission in the Grotto Dungeon.
Note: This is a daily quest.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Grotto Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Labyrinthian Lamentation (Daily)
LTE_Starlight.description:
Descend again into the Labyrinth! Complete a mission in the Labyrinth dungeon.
Note: This is a daily quest.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Labyrinth Dungeon.

LTE_Starlight.name: Return to the Lab (Daily)
LTE_Starlight.description:
Complete a mission in the Lab dungeon.
Note: This is a daily quest.

objectives.description: Complete a mission in the Lab Dungeon.

LTE_Storm2018.name: Endless Storms
LTE_Storm2018.description: Storms are rapidly spreading. Look at all that purple turbulance on the map! Complete some missions in those hexes. Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Complete 2 Mutant Storm missions

LTE_Storm2018.name: Only the Strong Survive
LTE_Storm2018.description:
A 7 Day mission in a Power 70 zone? Can you survive?

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 7 Day Survive the Storm in a 30 zone

LTE_Storm2018.name: The Will to Survive
LTE_Storm2018.description:
Survive a 7 Day mission in a Power 40 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 7 Day Survive the Storm in a 20 zone

LTE_Storm2018.name: Against All Odds
LTE_Storm2018.description:
Survive the Storm for 7 days in a Power 15 zone.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete a 7 Day Survive the Storm in a 10 zone

LTE_Storm2018.name: Into The Storm
LTE_Storm2018.description:
Successfully complete Survive the Storm missions in any threat level.

You can access Survive the Storm by selecting the Map tab and then selecting the Survive the Storm pin.

objectives.description: Complete 3 Survive the Storm missions

LTE_Storm2018.name: Steel Icarus
LTE_Storm2018.description: Launch Lars deep into the storm!

objectives.description: Launch Lars beyond the wall of clouds

LTE_Storm2018.name: Reunion Tour
LTE_Storm2018.description: It's time to finish Carlos' research! Protect the telescope array until the results come in!

objectives.description: Defend the telescope array (4 telescopes) while they are observing the sky

LTE_Storm2018.name: Cleverboards
LTE_Storm2018.description: Commander, I have come up with a foolproof hoverboard based plan to track Carlos down! The only problem is, these hoverboards are idiots! I need your help. Searching rooftops for AC units should help us find the parts we need. Found in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Gather AC control circuits from AC units for the Smart Hoverboards

LTE_Storm2018.name: Last Known Position
LTE_Storm2018.description: Lars has asked us not to search for Carlos. So let's play it cool... as we search the rooftops for Carlos' research equipment. Found mostly in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find and interact with the research equipment someone's been installing on the rooftops

LTE_Storm2018.name: Hover Over Yonder
LTE_Storm2018.description: We don't have time to train the hoverfleet, but I think they'll figure it out. Head out and launch those brilliant boards!

objectives.description: Deploy smart hoverboards on their journey

LTE_Storm2018.name: Its What's Inside That Counts
LTE_Storm2018.description: We need husk data... the gross kind of husk data. So take no prisoners and collect all samples!

objectives.description: Eliminate and collect mist monster data

LTE_Storm2018.name: Iron Van
LTE_Storm2018.description: Lars is not going to like it, but we need to upgrade his van for the journey into the storm.Gather the insulators from electrical transformers. Found mostly in Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find insulators from power transformers around the world

LTE_Storm2018.name: Oh, Wait. Maps!
LTE_Storm2018.description: If we're going to head out west, we'll need maps. Search the industrial zone for vehicles likely to have maps. Trucks are easiest to find in Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Gather maps from Trucks and RVs

LTE_Storm2018.name: What's A Payphone?
LTE_Storm2018.description: The Hover Fleet is calling back! Track down payphones to collect their reports. Found in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find public payphones the smart hoverboards are calling and retrieve the data

LTE_Storm2018.name: Liner Notes
LTE_Storm2018.description: Steel Wool mania is sweeping Homebase. Scour the streets for anything Steel Wool related. Found mostly in Urban and Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Look for Steel Wool album records

LTE_Storm2018.name: Deep Cuts
LTE_Storm2018.description: Lars' sensor upgrade is a success, but no one can understand the new data. The answer to this strange data may lie in Lars' past. Search any basements to find Lars' old research. Found in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find Lars's old research data

LTE_Storm2018.name: Van Down!
LTE_Storm2018.description: Help Lars restore his van's systems by collecting backup data from any server racks you can find. Found mostly in Urban and Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find server clusters in the world and use them for some number-crunching

LTE_Storm2018.name: Breaker! Breaker!
LTE_Storm2018.description: Lars' van can't keep up with the strange new developments in the sky. Blast open the Van's doors of perception by collecting encrypted radio components from emergency response vehicles.

objectives.description: Destroy firetrucks, police cars and ambulances to retrieve Encrypted Radio parts

LTE_Storm2018.name: Stars, Man.
LTE_Storm2018.description: Lars hasn't slept in days and his vital signs do not look good. Let's check in to see what he needs before he crashes his van. The sky atlases can be found mostly in Urban and Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Find sky atlas parts by destroying bookshelves

LTE_Storm2018.name: Encore
LTE_Storm2018.description: Lars is ready to rock. Who are we to stand in the way?

objectives.description: Deploy speakers and blast Steel Wool's greatest hits to repel the storm

LTE_Storm2018.name: Eye Spy
LTE_Storm2018.description: Lars wants telescopes... I have no idea why. Search for telescope parts and I'll figure our what Lars is up to. Found in Urban, Suburban and Industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find broken telescopes that we could use to construct a telescope array

StormKingDailies.name: Kingslayer
StormKingDailies.description: Defeat the Storm King! Are you up for this Daily Challenge?

objectives.description: Defeat the Storm King

LTE_Summer2019.name: Take a Bow
LTE_Summer2019.description: The party was a smash success, take a bow. You deserve it.

objectives.description: Complete "Get Ready to Party..."
Complete "Make That a COLD Drink"
Complete "Batter Up!"
Complete "Party Games"
Complete "Towel off!"
Complete "Hit the Hoops"
Complete "Summer Bummer"
Complete "Party Decor"
Complete "Find the Fun"
Complete "Light'em Up"
Complete "Party Crashers"
Complete "No Mow"
Complete "Beat the Heat"
Complete "Did We Forget Something?"

LTE_Summer2019.name: Did We Forget Something?
LTE_Summer2019.description: Ray sort of, uh, forgot to send out the last batch of invites for the Summer party. Looks like well need to find some people!

objectives.description: Rescue survivors

LTE_Summer2019.name: Beat the Heat
LTE_Summer2019.description: The people of Homebase are officially too hot to party! Collect air conditioning parts to chill everyone out.

objectives.description: Harvest air conditioner units to collect their parts

LTE_Summer2019.name: No Mow
LTE_Summer2019.description: If the world has ended, why are we still mowing the lawn? Lets destroy all remnants of that ancient chore and harvest their parts! Hint: These are easiest found in suburban missions.

objectives.description: Harvest lawn mower parts

LTE_Summer2019.name: Party Crashers
LTE_Summer2019.description: We've got party crashers! Take 'em out!

objectives.description: Eliminate husks

LTE_Summer2019.name: Light'em Up
LTE_Summer2019.description: Let's celebrate this party with a bang!

objectives.description: Light off the fireworks

LTE_Summer2019.name: Find the Fun
LTE_Summer2019.description: No summer party is complete without a fireworks show! Well need a lot of them if we want our party booming.

objectives.description: Collect boxes of fireworks

LTE_Summer2019.name: Party Decor
LTE_Summer2019.description: We're not going to make the slideshow of 10 Homebase Parties With Pizzaz if we don't have decorations!

objectives.description: Collect flamingo lawn ornaments

LTE_Summer2019.name: Summer Bummer
LTE_Summer2019.description: We have reports of misty party crashers. Take 'em out!

objectives.description: Eliminate mist monsters of any type

LTE_Summer2019.name: Hit the Hoops
LTE_Summer2019.description: The Twine Bounders are set to take on the Plankerton Smashers in the first annual Homebase Playoffs... we should probably build a court. Collect basketball hoops.  Hint: These are easiest found in suburban missions.

objectives.description: Collect parts from basketball hoops

LTE_Summer2019.name: Towel Off!
LTE_Summer2019.description: There's a soggy emergency on the pool deck! Find towels! Hint: These are easiest found in city or surburban missions.

objectives.description: Collect pool towels

LTE_Summer2019.name: Party Games
LTE_Summer2019.description: Nothing gets a party started like a fun ice breaker. Get the fun started with some Wargames. Access Wargames from the Storm Shield Computer in your Homebase or by assisting other players via Neighborhood Watch.

objectives.description: Complete two Wargames simulations

LTE_Summer2019.name: Batter Up!
LTE_Summer2019.description: Warm up for the 2nd annual Homebase Softball Extravaganza by taking a swing at some husks.

objectives.description: Eliminate husks with melee

LTE_Summer2019.name: Make That a COLD Drink
LTE_Summer2019.description: What good is a warm drink for our summer party? Go get some ice.

objectives.description: Destroy ice machines, freezers, or refrigerators to collect ice

LTE_Summer2019.name: Get Ready to Party
LTE_Summer2019.description: What better way to celebrate the summer than hosting a party? Start it off right by getting something to drink for our guests...

objectives.description: Collect jugs of water

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_2.name: Piece of Cake
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_2.description: Celebrate two years of Fortnite with some delicious cake! Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Find birthday cakes

LTE_Fortnite_Bday_2.name: Sploding Husks
LTE_Fortnite_Bday_2.description: Put an end to the Husk celebrations. Take out those Cake Sploders!

objectives.description: Eliminate Cake Sploders

LTE_BigBen.name: You Broke Time
LTE_BigBen.description: You broke time! Search the zone for Vindertech Holo-Kiosks to see if we can undo the damage. Note: the holo kiosks might look different depending on the timeline you are currently inhabiting.

objectives.description: Find Holo-kiosks

LTE_BigBen.name: Coalition of Doomed and Failed Realities
LTE_BigBen.description: Search the zone for non-apocalyptic solutions to repair our broken timeline.

objectives.description: Collect Books

LTE_BigBen.name: Vroo-Over
LTE_BigBen.description: Fight the husky horde and keep an ear out for Ray's Time Broadcasts.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husky Husks

LTE_Season10A.name: Dark Days
LTE_Season10A.description: Help set up a tribunal for Dark Ray by collecting judge wigs.

objectives.description: Collect judge wigs

LTE_Season10A.name: This Time
LTE_Season10A.description: Deploy boomboxes to broadcast Dennis Jr.'s messages from the future.

objectives.description: Deploy Boombox

LTE_Season10A.name: The Big Slurp
LTE_Season10A.description: Deploy sensor balloons to help Lars determine if reality is collapsing.

objectives.description: Deploy Sensor Balloon

LTE_Season10A.name: The Forever Ned
LTE_Season10A.description: It's not a time stabilization suit, but the next best thing: deploy Ned Packs while looking for other ways of helping Ned.

objectives.description: Deploy Ned Packs

LTE_Season10A.name: Long Road Home
LTE_Season10A.description: Destroy cabinets and collect canned supplies to prepare Dennis Jr. for his return to his own reality.

objectives.description: Destroy cabinets and collect cans of food

LTE_Season10A.name: Deadbeat
LTE_Season10A.description: Destroy book cases and collect "Psychology for Dummies" books in suburban or urban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy bookcases to collect books

LTE_Season10A.name: Timeless Fashion
LTE_Season10A.description: Dennis Jr. needs materials to build a stabilization suit. Eliminate Husky Husks or Smashers to collect the needed Dense Violentium.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husky Husks or Smashers and gather Dense Violentium

LTE_Season10A.name: Comet Jr.
LTE_Season10A.description: Gather intel at the site of the meteor impact.

objectives.description: Investigate the meteor

LTE_Season10A.name: Darkerest Days
LTE_Season10A.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters to avoid a Dark Future.

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters

LTE_Season10A.name: Sending the Suit
LTE_Season10A.description: Explore potential hiding locations for Dennis Jr.

objectives.description: Explore a restaurant
Explore a construction site
Explore a park

LTE_Season10A.name: It's a Lot to Give
LTE_Season10A.description: Help Ned escape his time loop by destroying fire trucks, police cars, and ambulances to collect nedkits.

objectives.description: Destroy fire trucks, police cars, and ambulances to collect nedkits

LTE_Season10A.name: Ray Array
LTE_Season10A.description: Explore parks where versions of Ray may have returned from the future in suburban and urban zones.

objectives.description: Search parks in suburban and urban zones

LTE_Season10A.name: Tell Me Everything
LTE_Season10A.description: Find boxes of hypnosis equipment to help jog Dennis Jr.'s memory.

objectives.description: Find boxes of hypnosis materials

LTE_Season10A.name: And Dennis Jr. Makes Three
LTE_Season10A.description: Search for DNA testing equipment for Dennis Jr. Hint: Best found in urban, suburban, or industrial zones.

objectives.description: Find DNA blood testing equipment

LTE_Season10A.name: I Collect Coins
LTE_Season10A.description: Destroy coin operated machines and collect coins to test Lars' theory of colliding realities. Hint: Best found in urban, suburban, or industrial zones.

objectives.description: Destroy coin operated machines and collect the coins dropped

LTE_Vindertech.name: Walls Come Tumbling Down
LTE_Vindertech.description: Commander, watch out! These Lobber Husks are mutated by the storm. Eliminate as many of them as you can!

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Wall Weakening Lobber Husks in Mutant Storm missions

LTE_Vindertech.description: Commander, watch out! These Husky Husks are mutated by the storm. Eliminate as many of them as you can!

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Enraged Husky Husks in Mutant Storm missions

objectives.description: Evolve a Vindertech Weapon by 1 Star

LTE_Vindertech.name: Vindertech Weapon Enhancement
LTE_Vindertech.description: Visit the Armory tab to level up a Vindertech Weapon of your choice.

objectives.description: Find the infamous Durrr Burger restaurant

LTE_Winter2017.name: Welcome to the Party, Pal!
LTE_Winter2017.description: Find Ray's present stash, and make with the merriment!

objectives.description: Complete the Spread the Joy mission

LTE_Winter2017.name: Who Goes There?
LTE_Winter2017.description: We've got rumors of a strange creature frozen in the survival zone ice. Let's check it out. What could go wrong? (only found in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Find the Frozen Thing in the ice

LTE_Winter2017.name: Monster Snowstorms
LTE_Winter2017.description: Lets see what those vacuum tube weapons can do against the mist monsters!

objectives.description: Eliminate 50 Mist Monsters with a Vacuum Tube Weapon

LTE_Winter2017.name: Present Drop
LTE_Winter2017.description: Lars' van is on the move! Be on the lookout for Present Drops and see what you receive! (not available in Ride the Lightning mission). Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Complete a Present Drop in a successful mission

LTE_Winter2017.name: Like a "Mini-Boss"
LTE_Winter2017.description: Eliminate as many Epic Mini-Bosses as you can, Commander! (also available in Survive the Storm). Note: This is a repeatable Quest.

objectives.description: Eliminate an Epic Mini-Boss in a Mini-Boss mission

LTE_Winter2017.name: Relentless Onslaught
LTE_Winter2017.description: Lets see what your heroes can do against the Epic Mini-Bosses! (also available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Eliminate 10 Epic Mini-Bosses in Mini-Boss missions

LTE_Winter2017.name: Deep Freeze
LTE_Winter2017.description:

LTE_Winter2017.name: Jingle all the Way!
LTE_Winter2017.description: Track down the perfect gifts for your Homebase family. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Find 12 holiday gifts

LTE_Winter2017.name: No Joy
LTE_Winter2017.description: Listen to Radio Free Plankerton's call in show.  (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Listen to 8 radio broadcasts

LTE_Winter2017.name: The Fairytale of Homebase
LTE_Winter2017.description: Find the perfect story to read together this holiday season. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Find 10 holiday story books

LTE_Winter2017.name: Cold Miser
LTE_Winter2017.description: It might be cold out there this time of year, but we're gonna need some serious freeze juice for our new weapon, try searching in cities. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Harvest refrigerators and collect 12 freezer units

LTE_Winter2017.name: Fruitcakes!
LTE_Winter2017.description: Let's make a fruit cake! because why not? The ingredients are most commonly found in forests. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Harvest large bushes and collect 15 fruits and nuts

LTE_Winter2017.name: Deck the Lights
LTE_Winter2017.description: Can't spread good cheer without festive firepower! let's gather everything we need! Start by collecting switchboards from traffic and street lights. (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Harvest traffic and street lights to collect 10 switchboards

LTE_Winter2017.name: The Perfect Tree
LTE_Winter2017.description: Search the zone for happy little trees.  (not available in Survive the Storm)

objectives.description: Harvest small pine trees and collect 20 pristine trees
Complete 2 Mission Alerts

LTE_Winter2018.name: Home for the Holidays
LTE_Winter2018.description: The holidays are about spending time with friends and family. And saving friends and family from monsters. Let's get started!

objectives.description: Save Survivors

LTE_Winter2018.name: Coal to the World
LTE_Winter2018.description: Take out those coal lobbing... coal lobbers!

objectives.description: Eliminate Coal Lobbers

LTE_Winter2018.name: Krampage
LTE_Winter2018.description: There's Krampus on the loose spreading holiday fear. Send those frosty creeps packing.

objectives.description: Eliminate Krampus

LTE_Winter2018.name: A Little Help...
LTE_Winter2018.description: Li'l Evil Helpers are on a festive rampage! Take 'em out.

objectives.description: Eliminate Li'l Evil Helpers

LTE_Winter2018.name: You Better Watch Out
LTE_Winter2018.description: Mall santas are on a rampage! Take out these so-called santas before it's too late!

objectives.description: Eliminate Mall Santas

LTE_Winter2018.name: Happy Huskin' New Years
LTE_Winter2018.description: Here's to another year! Happy New Year to you, yours, and every husk-crushing hero out there fighting the good fight.

objectives.description: Celebrate New Year

LTE_Winter2018.name: For You
LTE_Winter2018.description: There's a little something special for you waiting to be found. Take a look!

objectives.description: Find the Present
Find Boxes of Holiday Ornaments

LTE_Winter2018.name: Tree for All
LTE_Winter2018.description: Time to spread some holiday cheer!

objectives.description: Place Christmas Trees

LTE_Winter2018.name: Top Secret Santa
LTE_Winter2018.description: With Ray on holiday break, someone needs to spread joy...

objectives.description: Find Holiday Gifts

LTE_Winter2018.name: The... Other Thing!
LTE_Winter2018.description: There's something sinister in the ice... find it, then defeat an enemy wave (Only available in Frostnite)

objectives.description: Find the Frozen Thing in the Ice

LTE_Winter2018.name: A Fridge Too Far
LTE_Winter2018.description: It's time to fight ice with fire! Collect freezer units from refrigerators to build the perfect winter weapon.

objectives.description: Collect Freezer Units from Refrigerators

LTE_Winter2018.name: Take a Bough
LTE_Winter2018.description: Some sort of holiday monster has joined Homebase, and he wants to find the perfect tree. I think we'd better do what he says.

objectives.description: Harvest Small Pine Trees and Collect Pristine Trees

LTE_Season11F.name: Bonus: Needle in a Haystack
LTE_Season11F.description: Finding a needle in a haystack may not be as difficult as everyone says it is. Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Find the needle

LTE_Season11F.name: Bonus: Cracking Down
LTE_Season11F.description: Find and destroy Crackshot's favorite decoration in Crackshot's Neighborhood. Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Destroy Crackshot's favorite decoration

LTE_Season11F.name: Bonus: More Holiday Fear
LTE_Season11F.description: Husks continue to make a mockery of the holidays. Crackshot is satisfied with the current spread of holiday fear, but more would make him even more joyful!

objectives.description: Eliminate more Santa Husky Husks and Mrs. Claus Lobbers

LTE_Season11F.name: Bonus: Crackshot's Key
LTE_Season11F.description: Crackshot has lost the key to his holiday treasure. Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Find Crackshot's lost key

LTE_Season11F.name: Bonus: Crackshot's Treasure
LTE_Season11F.description: Use the mysterious key to unlock Crackshot's secret holiday treasure - a gift to you! Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Use the key to unlock Crackshot's hidden treasure

LTE_Season11F.name: Bonus: Protector of Presents
LTE_Season11F.description: The husks have started a war on presents! Protect as many presents as possible and give everyone a happy holiday. Hint: Must be completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Collect presents in a Protect the Presents mission

LTE_Season11F.name: A Hopeful Song
LTE_Season11F.description: Celebrate the holidays by blaring music from speakers for all to hear, whether they like it or not. Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Deploy speakers to spread holiday cheer

LTE_Season11F.name: His Heart Grew Five Sizes
LTE_Season11F.description: It is time for Crackshot to learn his valuable lesson. Collect expired energy drinks to help him become a large-hearted holiday hero. Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Destroy vending machines to gather energy drinks

LTE_Season11F.name: Stockings Must Hang
LTE_Season11F.description: Spread holiday cheer by decorating trees in Crackshot's Neighborhood. Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Decorate trees for the holidays

LTE_Season11F.name: Bring Me Santa's Head
LTE_Season11F.description: Crackshot has demanded Santa's head. Ray has a different idea. Collect newspapers to create paper-mache. Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Gather papers from newsstands

LTE_Season11F.name: The Holiday's Hottest Toy
LTE_Season11F.description: Crackshot demands the holiday season's hottest toy. Find it, or else! Hint: Best completed in a Protect the Presents mission.

objectives.description: Find presents for Crackshot

LTE_Season11F.name: Holiday Fear
LTE_Season11F.description: Husks have been making a mockery of the season by wearing discourteous costumes. Crackshot demands Santa Husky Husks and Mrs. Claus Lobbers be taught a lesson.

objectives.description: Eliminate Santa Husky Husks and Mrs. Claus Lobbers

LTE_Season11F.name: Holly Jolly Ransom
LTE_Season11F.description: Crackshot has been kidnapped! Collect pieces of the ransom note and discover the kidnappers' demands.

objectives.description: Investigate Crackshot's kidnapping

LTE_Season11G.name: There's No Place Like Van for the Holidays
LTE_Season11G.description: Join Lars and Willow to deliver gifts to the survivors and spread hope and joy to everyone!

objectives.description: Deliver gifts to survivors

LTE_Season11G.name: We Wish You a Merry Fright Maze
LTE_Season11G.description: The best gifts are personal. For Willow, that's a giant maze she can haunt.

objectives.description: Build a maze for Willow to haunt in Crackshot's Neighborhood

LTE_Season11G.name: Mist-letoe
LTE_Season11G.description: There's another holiday tradition that Homebase would like to try to break Willow out of her funk - mistletoe! The standard variety won't work for ghosts. Eliminate husks to find ghost mistletoe. Hint: Not all husks drop ghost mistletoe.

objectives.description: Eliminate husks to find ghost mistletoe

LTE_Season11G.name: Slayride
LTE_Season11G.description: Remind Willow of some of her favorite haunts by eliminating Husks with traps.

objectives.description: Eliminate enemies with traps

LTE_Season11G.name: All I Want For Christmas is Boo
LTE_Season11G.description: Dennis wants to make Willow a delicious ghost meal, but needs some help to find what ghosts eat. Hint: Best completed in a City or Suburban zone.

objectives.description: Search book piles for ghost cookbooks

LTE_Season11G.name: O Ghostmas Tree
LTE_Season11G.description: To help Willow feel like she's not alone, Ray has decided to create ghost trees. Destroy beds to collect bedsheets. Hint: Best completed in a City or Suburban zone.

objectives.description: Gather bedsheets by destroying beds

LTE_Season11G.name: No Sleep 'Til...
LTE_Season11G.description: Homebase is having trouble sleeping, so it's time to make the best of the situation. Collect coffee makers to help keep the team awake. Hint: Best completed in a City or Suburban zone.

objectives.description: Collect coffee makers

LTE_Season11H.name: Monkey Times
LTE_Season11H.description: Ted and his creations are set on reclaiming his creative spark. Find crafting supplies to help: a mannequin head, sewing machine, collection of thread, bolts of cloth, and cans of dye.

objectives.description: Collect crafting supplies for Ted
Collect Thread
Collect Bolts of Cloth
Collect Mannequin Head
Collect Dye
Collect Sewing Machine

LTE_Season11H.name: Tea And Sympathy
LTE_Season11H.description: Ray is going to help Jilly make amends and there's no better way than breaking bread with those she has wronged, or - in this case - sharing tea.

objectives.description: Set up apology tea parties

LTE_Season11H.name: I Am the Law... Apparently
LTE_Season11H.description: Sgt. Tank Gatling demands a trial by combat by eliminating Zappers in the area. Eliminate them and collect dense violentium to prove your case.

objectives.description: Eliminate Zapper husks and gather dense violentium

LTE_Season11H.name: Toying With Your Emotions
LTE_Season11H.description: Ted has been sentenced to die! There must be a lawyer among the survivors who can plead his case.

objectives.description: Rescue survivors to find a defense attorney

LTE_Season11H.name: The Bean Plan
LTE_Season11H.description: Ray has been deposed and exiled from Homebase. She has a plan and she needs beans to pull it off.

objectives.description: Collect cans of beans

LTE_Season11H.name: The Rise of Jilly
LTE_Season11H.description: Jilly is tired of the other toys stealing her spotlight. Destroy as many as you can find!  Hint: Best completed in City or Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy toys

LTE_Season11H.name: [PH] Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Outlander
LTE_Season11H.description: [PH] Homebase picked up a strange transmission. It sounds like someone needs help!

objectives.description: [PH] Find and protect the Tinkerer

LTE_Season11H.name: Day Of The Living Ted
LTE_Season11H.description: A survivor named Ted is on the run and needs Homebase's help. Find him in the storm and bring him back to safety.

objectives.description: Find and rescue Ted

Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.name: Clearing the Air
Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.description: Set up loadspeakers so everyone can unburden themselves of their nauseating secrets.

objectives.description: Deploy Loudspeakers

Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.name: Accidental Guests
Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.description: ...You might have accidentally summoned Mist Monsters while trying to help Carter. Hunt them down and eliminate them!

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters

Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.name: There's No Place Like Tomb
Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.description: Guide Carter to the other side by lighting ceremonial fires according to the diagram Ray gave Lok.

objectives.description: Deploy Fires to Guide Carter

Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.name: Needling the Competition
Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.description: Carter might be here because she wants revenge on her old rivals. Find the tombstones of Needle and his gang and destroy them!

objectives.description: Destroy Tombstones of Needle's Gang

Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.name: Old News
Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.description: Ray believes that the haunting can be traced back to a single event. Search old newspapers for what could cause such a calamitous curse!

objectives.description: Search old newspapers for information

Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.name: Good Morning, Spirit Realm
Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.description: There's a lost soul haunting Clip's latest gun! Salvage old televisions in Hexsylvania to build a way to communicate with it.

objectives.description: Search televisions for parts

Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.name: Intro to Dark Magic
Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.description: A truth storm has hit Homebase. Find arcane reference books to discover the cause.

objectives.description: Collect arcane reference books

Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.name: Like A Sponge
Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.description: The Husks have been absorbing this weird energy for ages. Eliminate them and collect data on the energy field.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks and collect data

Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.name: Cursed Materials
Phoenix_Fall_Narrative.description: Clip is short on gun crafting materials. Search barrels of scrap for the parts she needs!

objectives.description: Search scrap barrels for gun parts

Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.name: Wordy Shirts
Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.description: Join the Major in a top secret Thank You mission.

objectives.description: Find Major's Gifts

Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.name: Reload
Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.description: Join Val and the Major in the field for a husky reintroduction to the the fight.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks with headshots.

Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.name: Fork Knife
Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.description: Help Val prepare the Major for the battles ahead. HINT: Electronics can be found in Industrial areas!

objectives.description: Collect old Electronics for Major's Arm

Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.name: Take Three
Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.description: Deploy loudspeakers for Val so she can deliver a message to the hiding Major.

objectives.description: Deploy Speakers

Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.name: Hate to See You Leave
Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.description: If anyone can get through to the Major, it's his favorite student, Val. Rescue survivors while Homebase searches for Val.

objectives.description: Rescue survivors!

Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.name: If This Van's a Ragin'
Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.description: Time to get down to brass tacks, from high above in Lars' Van. Deploy monitoring antennas in the surrounding area.

objectives.description: Deploy Antennas

Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.name: Major Rager
Phoenix_Spring_Narrative.description: We've got a Major rage issue on our hands. Take out some husks to cool things down.

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks or Mist Monsters

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: The adventure continues in the Blasted Badlands!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in a Power Level 50+ Venture Zone

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: The adventure continues in the Blasted Badlands!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in a Power Level 42+ Venture Zone

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.name: A Dangerous Venture
Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: The adventure continues in the Blasted Badlands!

objectives.description: Complete a mission in a Power Level 22+ Venture Zone
