Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.name: Hostile Ventures
Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: Time to start acting like a hero! Eliminate Husks in a Venture zone

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.name: A Lifesaving Venture
Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: Help Dennis complete his training. Rescue survivors in a Venture zone.

objectives.description: Get out there and save some lives!

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.name: Crash Course
Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: Dennis needs endurance training. Help him destroy vehicles in a Venture zone.

objectives.description: Training continues with a car culling smashfest.

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.name: Venturous Journey
Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: Dennis is charged with surveying the area. Destroy information kiosks and gather maps in a Venture zone

objectives.description: Collect maps, and chart a path... to the future.

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.name: Rewind
Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: Gather intel on Dennis' dark twin by searching for storm Tracking Cameras in a Venture zone.

objectives.description: Search Security Footage To Discover The Impostor's Origin

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.name: It's A Sign
Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: Signs are directing survivors the wrong way. Help Dennis destroy these road signs in a Venture zone.

objectives.description: Protect survivors by destroying misleading signs.

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.name: Fired
Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: Light a fire under Dennis. Destroy campfires and ovens in a Venture zone

objectives.description: Destroy campfires and ovens

Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.name: Crude Awakening
Phoenix_Summer_Narrative.description: The director needs oil for the failing generators. Destroy oil rigs, gas pumps, or barrels to collect oil in a Venture zone

objectives.description: Destroy Oil Rigs, gas pumps, or barrels to collect Oil

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: Silent Light
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: The table is set and the plans are in motion. Time to light the candles and let the terrible Christmas unfold.

objectives.description: Light Christmas Candles throughout the land!

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: Laser Blasters Hung by the Mantle with Flair
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: Ted wants to reboot the Morpho Gear Gang. Find inspiration to help him!

objectives.description: Find Books to Inspire Ted
Find Toys to Inspire Ted
Find Televisions to Inspire Ted

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: Sit In
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: Jilly's got a plan to throw the most agonizing Christmas dinner the season's ever seen. Help her test-drive the holiday horror on Dennis.

objectives.description: Find your seat, the season's worst dinner party is about to begin.

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: Tanksgiving
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: With the help of the Misfit Toys, find the worst presents for everyone at Homebase.

objectives.description: Help the Misfit Toys find the worst gifts ever!

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: A Gift You Cannot Refuse
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: Willow has the perfect present to make this a truly terrible Christmas. Track down Willow's gifts before it's too late.

objectives.description: Find and collect Willow's presents

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: Save the Date
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: Time to let off a little steam by dealing with the mobs of husks. Get a little practice with your aim and eliminate husks with headshots!

objectives.description: Eliminate Husks with headshots.

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: Misfits
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: If you really want this to be the worst Christmas ever, you need professionals. It's time to reunite Ted and the Misfit Toys.

objectives.description: Reunite with Ted
Reunite with Jilly Teacup
Reunite with Tank Gatling

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: Dreams
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: Just to be certain everyone is accounted for, Ray calls for an all hands rescue mission. Find and rescue survivors!

objectives.description: Rescue survivors!

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: Twas the Night Before Tuesday
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: Nothing ruins the festive spirit a visit from the Ghost of Christmas Whatever. Help Willow usher in the darkness by destroying street lights. Hint: Best completed in City or Suburban zones.

objectives.description: Destroy street lights.

Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.name: Let It Slush
Phoenix_Winter_Narrative.description: It's time for a holly jolly do-over. Get the terrible Christmas celebration started by collecting bags of slushy snow to rain down on homebase!

objectives.description: Collect festive bags of slush

StormKingQuests.name: King Me
StormKingQuests.description: The Storm King's minions are tough and should provide a great way to hone your skills. They are also blocking the way to the Storm King, so eliminating them is not really optional.

objectives.description: Eliminate 2 Epic Mini-Bosses in a 140+ zone

StormKingQuests.name: Regicide
StormKingQuests.description: They say the bigger they are, the harder they fall. We certainly hope that is the case with this new Storm King. Good luck, Commander!

objectives.description: Eliminate the Mythic Storm King

STWIrwinQuests.name: The Most Dangerous Tame
STWIrwinQuests.description: Help Ray and Gia bring peace to the wilds of Homebase with a no holds barred taming spree.

objectives.description: Tame Animals

STWIrwinQuests.name: Not to Boar You
STWIrwinQuests.description: Harness the searching skills the animal kingdom by joining a boar scavenger hunt.

objectives.description: Harness the boar's searching skills.

STWIrwinQuests.name: The Wolf Snack
STWIrwinQuests.description: Bribe Gia's wolf pack and other animals into spilling their secrets with tasty treats.

objectives.description: Feed the animals.

STWIrwinQuests.name: Buildasaurus Rex
STWIrwinQuests.description: Distract the raptor forces with a perfectly built dino distraction.

objectives.description: Build a dino distraction

STWIrwinQuests.name: Brawl of the Wild
STWIrwinQuests.description: Go on a wild game hunt to help Ray and Dennis take on the dangerous animal invasion.

objectives.description: Eliminate the wild animals.

STWIrwinQuests.name: The Attack Pack
STWIrwinQuests.description: Eliminate wolfy confusion by teaching the pack to take out the husk horde.

objectives.description: Eliminate husks with a tamed wolf.

STWIrwinQuests.name: In the Hall of the Raptor Queen
STWIrwinQuests.description: Help the Raptor Queen cleanse her kingdom of mist monsters.

objectives.description: Eliminate Mist Monsters with a tamed raptor.

WeeklyQuests.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Mimics
WeeklyQuests.description: The Storm King's power grows! Hunt down mimics to slow him down.

objectives.description: Defeat 2 Mimics in Successful Missions in 140+ Zones

WeeklyQuests.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Storm Chests
WeeklyQuests.description: The Storm King's power grows! Open Storm Chests to hinder him!

objectives.description: Complete a Storm Chest in Successful Missions in 140+ Zones

WeeklyQuests.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Minibosses
WeeklyQuests.description: The Storm King's power grows! Defeat Minibosses to take out his support!

objectives.description: Defeat 3 Minibosses in 140+ Zones

WeeklyQuests.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Mist Monsters
WeeklyQuests.description: The Storm King's power grows! Fight back the Mist Monsters surging as a result!

objectives.description: Eliminate 20 Mist Monsters in 140+ Zones.

WeeklyQuests.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Survivors
WeeklyQuests.description: The Storm King's power grows! Save the Survivors affected before it's too late!

objectives.description: Rescue 10 Survivors in 140+ Zones

WeeklyQuests.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Defend the Van
WeeklyQuests.description: The Storm King's power grows! We need to survey the Storm for changes!

objectives.description: Complete 3 Ride the Lightning missions in 140+ Zones

WeeklyQuests.name: (Weekly) Scions of the Storm King: Elemental Husks
WeeklyQuests.description: The Storm King's power grows! Deal with the Elemental Husks that have surged as a result!

objectives.description: Eliminate 300 Elementals in 140+ Zones

WeeklyQuests.name: (Weekly) Defeat the Mythic Storm King!
WeeklyQuests.description: You've weakened the Storm King! Now's the time to strike! Send him packing!

objectives.description: Defeat the Mythic Storm King.
